texts.en: Marichu has her passion in a retailing business. Her business is doing well when she doubles her time to make promising sales daily. With her husband's help, she has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family. The reason why she availed herself of another loan from PMPC is to buy more stock to sell. Today, Marichu is able to help others to run a retailing business with her stock and they also earn for their own family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Tadeo

texts.en:
Taddeo is a 39-year-old married man  living in a rural area with his family of 6 children, all attend school. 

He is a businessman with a local brewing business. He earns an additional income from agriculture. He started this business to get enough income to meet his family's needs.

He works 3 days and requests a loan  to buy  brew supplies. He has hopes of expanding into a large business which can supply in large quantities.  His clients are traders from surrounding places.

 The challenges he faces are fluctuating prices.  He is grateful for the loan services.

loans.use: to buy plantains.

loans.name: Erick Melvin

texts.es:
Erick de 24 años de edad, estudió hasta 6º grado, está casado y su pareja se dedica a las labores del hogar, tiene 1 hijo que vive con él, por lo tanto 2 personas dependen de Erick.

Erick actualmente trabaja como empleado en una empresa que se dedica a la reparación de calles, tiene 6 años de ser empleado, además el ha trabajado en la agricultura que lo aprendió por parte de su padre quien es agricultor.


Él necesita el crédito para cancelar algunas deudas que tiene con otra institución, ademas para comprar materiales de construcción.


Los sueños de Erick son ver crecer a su hijo, darle todo lo necesario para que sea una persona de bien, además desea  tener un mejor trabajo.
texts.en:
Erick is 24 years old and studied through the sixth grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the household duties. They have a child who lives with them, so in total, Erick has two dependents.

Erick currently works as an employee for a company that is in charge of street repair. He has been an employee for six years. In addition, he works in agriculture since he learned the trade from his father who was also a farmer.

Erick needs this loan so that he can pay off a few debts that he currently has at another institution. In addition, he will buy construction materials. His dream is to see his son grow and provide him everything he needs to become a good person. Erick would also like to have a better job.

loans.use: to repay some debts at another institution and to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Choice

texts.en:
Choice is a 25-year-old young woman. She is married with two children and is currently living in the Buhera District of Zimbabwe. She is a Camfed Learner Guide volunteering at schools in her community. 

Over the past five months, she has grown her poultry business to its current capacity – producing about 50 broiler birds every six weeks and selling them to the local residents. She started the business in 2013 because she wanted to be financially independent.  

She began her business because she saw that it was very profitable in her community. Choice would very much like to increase her sales volume and become a supplier to major supermarkets. She will use the Kiva loan to purchase more broiler chicks and chick feed to increase production. She hopes to provide for herself and remain financially independent.

loans.use: To purchase more chicks and chick feeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase products in bulk to reduce costs and increase profits.

loans.name: M.zahid

texts.en:
M.zahid is 41 years old and married, the father of five children. He lives in Gujrat, Pakistan along with his family. He is the sole earner and responsible financially for the support of his family.

The income generated by his present herd is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so he wants to increase his business of poultry. He sells eggs to shopkeepers at wholesale rates and earns profit through his business. He has been doing it for the last fifteen years and has become famous for providing good-quality poultry products in his locality. 

With the support of the BRAC Pakistan, he has gradually improved his business. Currently he has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan, to increase his poultry business. 

This will help him to increase his sales, which will ultimately help generate more income for him. M.zahid thanks Kiva and their field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to enhance his egg sale business

loans.name: Roger Jose

texts.es: Roger es un microempresario emprendedor, quien tiene la edad de 23 años, acompañado y padre de dos hijos, por quienes se esfuerza cada día, con el objetivo de mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, se dedica a la comercialización de productos varios desde hace dos años en los departamentos de Rivas y Masaya, este negocio lo impulso cuando le pagaron la liquidación donde laboraba, cuenta con la ayuda de un trabajador que es remunerado, se ha propuesto seguir aumentando la clientela y diversificando los productos ofrecidos, por tal razón solicita el crédito para la compra de productos como es toallas, sandalias bajas, chinelas de hule, cobertores, camisetas, etc.
texts.en:
Roger is an enterprising micro-entrepreneur.  He is 23 years old and is married.  He is the father of two children, for whom he makes an effort every day.  With the goal of improving the living conditions of his family, he has worked selling various items for two years in the Rivas and Masaya regions.  He began this business when they made a severance payment to him at the place where he worked.  He has the help of an employee he pays.  

He intends to keep increasing his customer base and diversifying the products that he offers.  Because of this, he is asking for a loan to buy products such as towels, baja sandals, oilcloth slippers, blankets, t-shirts, etc.

loans.use: to buy products such as towels, baja sandals, oilcloth slippers, blankets, t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Mireya De La Concepcion

texts.es:
La sra Mireya de la Concepcion es Mestrta de un centro de educacion publico de primaria desde hace 24 años impartiendole sus enseñanzas a niños de entre 10 y 16 años todos los dias de lunes a viernes.
la sra Mireya de la concepcion esta solicitando un credito a ceprodel y kyva para mejorar su casa de habitacion (reparar el techo y cocina ) ya que con sus propios recursos se le a hecho imposible poder darle a su familia  mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Mireya de la Concepcion has been a teacher at a public primary school for 24 years, teaching students from 10 to 16 years old everyday from Monday through Friday.  

Mireya de la Concepcion is requesting a loan from Ceprodel and Kiva to improve her home (to repair the roof and kitchen) as it has been impossible for her to provide her family with better conditions with her own resources.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, rebar, and sheet metal, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Jamina

texts.en:
Jamina , 36 years old and a mother of two, runs a retail business in Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur in order to make a living. She has been doing this for over three years and earning well for the family. 

The business is running well and Jamina wants to improve it. She joined Gata Daku MPC and borrowed a loan to buy more used clothing to resell. To expand her business is her priority in order to ensure a better source income. In the future, she wants to improve the general living of her family.

loans.use: buy used clothing to sell

loans.name: Ismail

texts.en: Ismail is a hardworking 46-year-old man with six children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is in the transport business and at the same time engages in commercial farming. In the future, he is hoping to buy many vehicles for transport. Ismail has asked for a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Israel

texts.en: Israel is a married man living in Kagadi, Uganda, where he deals in produce selling alongside farming to generate his income. Although he is challenged by weather changes, which hinder transportation of his products, through hard work, he hopes to grow his business. Israel is asking for a loan to buy maize for selling.

loans.use: to buy maize for selling

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity, but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past two years, Fatuma has operated a food stall business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. Her potential customers are neighbors, pupils, and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Fatuma dreams of establishing a restaurant business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting, Fatuma wants to purchase stocks of wheat flour and maize flour, and ten kilograms of beans. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks for her food stall.

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Crispina works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling bananas in the Philippines and also earns additional income from the general store. Crispina is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of bananas to sell through her business.

Crispina has been sustaining her business activities through her past thirty-eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of bananas to sell

loans.name: Najdiya

texts.en:
Because Najdiya is a conservative lady, she asked her daughter to appear in the photo instead.

Najdiya is a 55-year-old, married woman, living with her family. 

Her daughter is a 20-year-old, university student, majoring in Accounting and she is in her third year. She is seeking to start working in her study field after getting her Bachelors’ degree, so that she will start financially supporting her family after she noticed the financial crisis her family has been facing. But, she doesn't currently have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. 

For that reason, Najdiya has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Saltanathan

texts.ru: Салтанатхан 45 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Салтанатхан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 1999 году с покупки скота на 1,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Салтанатхан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы, 11 овец и 0,80 ГА собственной земельной доли, на которой она ежегодно выращивает хлопок, арбузы и помидоры. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 35,000 сом (KGS). Прибыль от ведения собственного бизнеса позволила Салтанатхан начать строительство собственного дома. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку и установку энергосберегающих пластиковых окон и дверей, гипсокартона для утепления дома, и прочих строительных материалов. Салтанатхан очень хочет, чтобы ее семья жила в большом, просторном, уютном и теплом доме. Салтанатхан планирует и дальше развивать свою сельскохозяйственную деятельность, так как ей нужно накопить средства на свадьбу старшей дочери.
texts.en:
Saltanathan is 45 years old, married and the mother of three children. Saltanathan has secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, she works with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation, after having started in 1999 with the purchase of livestock for 1,000 som (KGS). 

Thanks to Saltanathan's persistent work, her farm currently has three cows, 11 sheep and 0.80 hectares of own land, on which she every year grows cotton, watermelons and tomatoes. The monthly income is around 35,000 som (KGS). The income from managing her own business made it possible for Saltanathan to start building her own house.

She turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) to purchase and install energy saving windows and doors, drywall for insulating the house and other building materials. Saltanathan would very much like for her family to live in a large, spacious, nice and warm house. 

Saltanathan plans to further develop her agricultural business, as she needs to save money for the wedding of her eldest daughter.

loans.use: to purchase energy saving windows and doors, drywall for insulation and other construction materials for house building

loans.name: Samuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Samuel de 22 años de edad, es un joven laborioso y dedicado a su familia desde muy temprana edad a trabajado duro para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar, a logrado estudiar el bachillerato y empezo estudiar en la universidad, pero por falta de recursos economicos tuvo que abandonarla y dedicarse por completo a las actividades productivas a corto plazo. Vive con su Madre y dos hermanas mas.

Samuel administra una pupuseria, su madre y una hermana las elaboran, Samuel y su hermano se dedican a atender a los clientes y en el aseo del lugar y tomar los pedidos de los clientes.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar dos mesas, sillas y una cocina para elaborar las ricas pupusas; porque las mesas y la cocina con las que trabaja son alquiladas y al hacer cuentas no le genera mucha ganacia estar alquilando y como el negocio va creciendo mas cada vez se llena mas de clientes Samuel y su familia han decidido comprar materiales propios.
texts.en:
Samuel is 22 years old; he is a hardworking young man who is dedicated to his family.  From a young age he has worked had to provide daily support to his household.  He was able to complete high school and he started his university studies, but he had to drop out because of a lack of financial resources and dedicate himself full-time to short-term productive work.  He lives with his mother and two sisters.  

Samuel runs a restaurant making and selling pupusas; his mother and a sister make them and Samuel and his brother serve their customers and clean the place and take customer orders.  

The loan he is requesting is to buy two tables, chairs, and a stove to make delicious pupusas because the tables and the stove they work with are rented and, when it's all added up, they do not make much money by renting and as the business is growing, with more customers filling the place every day, Samuel and his family have decided to buy their own materials.

loans.use: to buy two tables, chairs, and a stove to make delicious pupusas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: for annual maintenance of her hotel, purchasing additional furniture, and an electrical generator

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tobacco farm equipment and supplies to grow her business.

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru:
Сафарали в возрасте 44 лет начинает новый бизнес. Он сам родом из района Джиликуль. В этом районе климат и природа благоприятствует ведению скотоводства. По этой причине Сафарали хочет попробовать себя в этой сфере, а также считает это прибыльным бизнесом.
Сафарали многодетный отец. У него трое дочерей и трое сыновей. Его жена и старшая дочь занимаются шитьем. Сафарали для начала бизнеса не хватает 6000 сомони (TJS) и эту сумму он запрашивает в кредит, чтобы он смог закупить двух голов молодых бычков для откорма и перепродажи. Сафарали надеется получить финансирование, он полагается на вашу отзывчивость.
texts.en:
Safarali is at the age of 44 starting a new business. He was born in the Jilikul region. In this region the climate and environment is favourable to breeding livestock. For this reason, Safarali wants to try his hand in this area, and he also reckons that this is a profitable business.

Safarali is the father of many children. He has three daughters and three sons. His wife and eldest daugther work with sewing. Safarali is missing 6,000 somoni (TJS) in order to start his business, and he requests a loan in this amount, in order to be able to purchase two bull-calves to fatten and resell. 

Safarali hopes to get financing. He relies on your sympathy.

loans.use: to purchase two bull-calves to start a business

loans.name: El Pozo Group

texts.es: El pozo es un grupo solidario integrado por tres mujeres luchadoras y emprendedoras, el cual es coordinado por la señora Yajaira quien tiene la edad de 35 años, quien impulso un nuevo negocio como es la venta de artesanías en barros, ya que ante se dedicaba a la comercialización de carne de cerdo y nacatamales. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de artesanías en barro con diseño de luna, sol, mariposas, peces, campanas, etc., con los créditos anteriores la socia logro impulsar su nuevo negocio. El resto de integrantes son las señoras, Cruz quien tiene la edad de 62 años y comercializa hojas de chagüite y leña en las comunidades aledañas, y María Epifania de 55 años, comerciante de artesanías en barro en su comunidad desde hace veintidós años.
texts.en:
“El Pozo” is a united group made up of three hardworking and enterprising women, coordinated by Yajaira.  She is 35 years old and started her new pottery business.  She used to sell pork and nacatamales.

She is asking for this loan to buy pottery in the shape of the moon, the sun, butterflies, fish, bells, etc.  She used the previous loan to start the new business.

The other members are Cruz, 62, who sells plantain leaves and firewood in the nearby communities.  María Epifania, age 55, who has been selling pottery in her community for 22 years.

loans.use: to buy pottery items.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a businesswoman from Ozamiz City. She is 52 years old, is a widow and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari (general) store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. 

Helen is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without record of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. 

Helen continues to look for better business opportinuites, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is 29 years old, is married and lives in Peñablanca with his family. To make a living, he manages a furniture-making business. He makes tables, chairs and cabinets. He had been in his business for a year now and manages it well to earn income for his family. 

Alfred is now asking for 10,000 PHP to buy more wood and varnish to use in his business. He hopes to increase his profits so he can save funds for his family's future expenses.

loans.use: to buy more wood and varnish to use in his business

loans.name: Kipkorir

texts.en:
Kipkorir is 42 years old and married. He and his spouse have been blessed with three children. He is a dairy farmer and has been in the business for three years now. He also supports four family members.

Kipkorir will be using this loan to buy another dairy cow and feed for his dairy cattle. He will use the anticipated profits to start another business.

This is his first loan with VisionFund Kenya and his hope for the future is to be a successful dairy farmer.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow and feed

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es:
Lorena de 27 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, está casada y su esposo es motorista, tienen 2 hijos y el mayor estudia 2° grado, de ellos dependen sus hijos y nadie más vive en casa. 
Desde hace 6 meses Lorena tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa, antes trabajaba lavando y planchando ropa ajena, el horario de la tienda es de 7:30 am a 7:00 pm y le ayuda su esposo cuando puede. 
El crédito lo necesita para comprar productos básicos para su tienda y para construir un baño sanitario.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando para incrementar su negocio y seguir dándoles  la educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lorena is 27 years old and has a ninth grade education.  She is married and her husband works as a driver.  They have two children, the eldest is in second grade.  No one else lives with them and they support their children.

Lorena has had a small store in her home.  She used to do washing and ironing work for others.  Her store hours are from 7:30am to 7:00pm.  Her husband helps her when he can.

She needs this loan to buy basic products for her store and to build a bathroom.

Her dream is to continue working to grow her business and continuing to provide her children with an education.

loans.use: to stock her store and build a bathroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family.

loans.name: Elí Edilberto

texts.es:
Elí de 32 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos.
Elí se dedica a la elaboración de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños (sastrería) lo aprendió por sus padres se dedicaban a lo mismo, ahora él se encarga de elaborar los uniformes para los estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad.

Además, Elí trabaja en un cyber de su comunidad desde hace cinco años, lo hace de lunes a viernes y por las tardes trabaja en la sastrería, y son sus padres quienes se involucran en este trabajo.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar tela, hilo, zipper y también comprará una maquina de cocer ropa para aumentar su equipo de trabajo.

Eli sueña con crecer en su taller poco a poco y convertirse en un diseñador de moda, además desea mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Elí, age 32, studied through high school.  He is single and lives with his parents and siblings.  Elí works making clothing for women, men, and children (tailoring).  He learned this from his parents, who have the same line of work.  Now he is in charge of making the uniforms for the children in the community school.

Additionally, Elí has worked for five years in a cybercafé in his community.  He does this from Monday to Friday, and in the afternoons he works in the tailoring shop.  His parents are involved in this work.

He needs this loan to buy fabric, thread, zippers, and also to buy a sewing machine in order to increase his working machinery.

Elí dreams of growing his workshop bit by bit and becoming a fashion designer.  He also wants to improve his house.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, zippers, and also to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Aminah

texts.en:
Aminah, her husband and their only child live in Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Her husband works as a lower-management-level employee in a private company. As a housewife, Rika helps contribute to the family income by running a small stall that sells some drinks and mobile phone airtime. She joined Ruma about a month ago because she wanted to increase her family’s income. 

Aminah is very excited to expand her business by adding mobile phone airtime credits to the items she sells. As the business continues, she hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide more transactions for her community on the weekends. In the photo, Aminah is in her small stall. Aminah thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide mobile phone services in her community

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en: Arlene makes a living through her retailing business, and now busies herself in supervising the completion of their house. She runs a lumberyard in Cantabon, Siquijor, Philippines. She earns a promising income to support her family. She has signed up for membership with PMPC to gain access to capital for her business. She wants to increase her inventory to earn more income. She has taken a loan to purchase more lumber to sell. Arlene hopes to sustain her business and dreams to send all her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more lumber to sell

loans.name: Shahzoda

texts.ru:
Шахзода является студенткой третьего курса Государственного Медицинского Университета. Она учится на фармацевта. Ей 28 лет. К сожалению семейная жизнь Шахзоды не сложилось и она развелась с мужем и сейчас живет с родителями в городе Душанбе. Отец Шахзоды обычный таксист, а мать занимается производством одежды для новорожденных, таких как ползунки, распашонки и т.д. и сдает их для продажи в торговые точки.
Шахзода прилежная студентка, ей нравится ее будущая профессия и она с интересом учится. В данный момент Шахзода должна оплатить за годовой контракт в ВУЗе, который составляет 800 долларов США. Эту сумму она запрашивает в кредит, так как у них сейчас нет таких сбережений. Шахзода верит, что ей окажут поддержку и она сможет успешно продолжить учебу в ВУЗе.
texts.en:
The borrower and the woman shown in the picture is Shahzoda. She is works as an office manager. However this loan is going to benefit her sister Shahnoza. 
Shahnoza is a third year student at the State Medical University. She studies to be a pharmacist. She is 28 years old. Unfortunately, Shahnoza's married life did not work out well, and she divorced from her husband and currently lives with her parents in the city of Dushanbe. Shahnoza's father is a regular taxi driver, and her mother works with making clothes for newborns, such as romper suits, undershirts and so on, and sells them at a sales stall. 

Shahnoza is a diligent student. She likes her future professon and she is interested in studying. Currently Shahnoza needs to pay for her annual tuition at the university, which is 800 US dollar. She requests a loan in this amount, as they currently do not have such savings. Shahnoza believes that she will get support and that she will be able to successfully continue studying at university.

loans.use: to pay for her yearly tuition at the Medical University

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.ru: 50-летняя Зулайхо живет в районе Шахритус вместе с сыном и дочерью. Ее муж и старший сын находятся на заработках в России. Зулайхо вместе со вторым сыном занимается у себя во дворе дома птицеводством. Она выращивает индюков и сейчас в ее хозяйстве имеется 20 индюков. Зулайхо хочет поднять экономическое состояние семьи и поэтому решила начать еще один вид бизнеса. У нее есть опыт в сфере продаж одежды и Зулайхо хочет начать свой торговый бизнес. У Зулайхо есть торговая точка на рынке, однако ее начального капитала не хватает, чтобы привести товар. Поэтому Зулайхо обратилась за кредитом. Она на сумму кредита хочет закупить ассортимент сезонной мужской одежды. Зулайхо позитивный человек, она верит, что новыйе бизнес принесет ей успех.
texts.en:
50 year old Zulaykho lives in the Shahrituz region together with her son and daughter. Her husband and eldest son are migrant workers in Russia. Zulaykho and her other son work with poultry farming at their home. They breed turkeys and currently they have 20 turkeys at their house. 

Zulaykho would like to improve the economical standing of the family, and therefore she decided to start another type of business as well. She has experience in area of clothing retail, and would like to start a new retail business. Zulaykho has a sales point at the market, however her starting capital is not sufficient in order to purchase goods to sell. Therefore, she applied for a loan. 

For the loan amount she would like to purchase an assortment of men's seasonal clothing. Zulaykho is a positive person, and she believes that the new business will bring her success.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of men's clothing to start a retail business

loans.name: Felix Pedro

texts.es: Félix es un microempresario emprendedor, quien tiene le edad de 61 años, soltero, comerciante de hojas de chagüite, este es un producto que tiene mucha demanda, debido a que utiliza para la realización de tamales, nacatamales, entre otros, cuenta con la ayuda de dos trabajadores y solicita el crédito para la compra de lote de hojas de chagüite y flete de leñas, con los créditos anteriores ha logrado mantener su negocio, ya que es el que le permite obtener ingresos darle el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en:
Félix is an enterprising micro-entrepreneur. He is 61 years old, single, and works as a banana leaf merchant. This product is in great demand since it used for making tamales, Nicaraguan tamales, and other dishes.

Félix has the help of two workers. He is requesting a loan in order to buy a load of banana leaves and a load of firewood. With his previous loans, Félix has been able to maintain his business. This has enabled him to generate income so that he can provide for the daily needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy banana leaves and firewood to sell.

loans.name: Jeanette

texts.en:
Jeanette thought she was in the right place when she joined the microfinance group Paglaum MPC. She decided to give it a try after learning she could avail financial assistance for her hog-raising business. Jeanette has maintained her membership in good standing without records of default up to this day, having taken several loans and repaying all in a timely manner. 

Recently, Jeanette requested a new loan to buy additional heads of pigs and  bags of feeds. She wishes to manage her business more effectively with the support of her family, and dreams of someday opening a meat shop in the market and becoming a supplier of meat to neighboring towns as well.

loans.use: to buy additional heads of pigs and bags of feeds

loans.name: Brisa De Mar Group

texts.es:
Para llegar a la localidad donde se encuentra el grupo Brisa De Mar se viaja de 30 a 35 minutos en autobús, durante el recorrido, se pueden observar kilómetros de plantaciones de caña y algunas casas. En el lugar, también hay cultivo de productos alternativos aunque la mayoría es de autoconsumo, la caña representa el mayor ingreso para la población, basta mencionar que en el lugar se ubica un ingenio que es la mayor fuente de empleo, especialmente durante el periodo de corte de caña. 

Brisa De Mar es un grupo  conformado por  7 personas, trabajadoras, empáticas, amables, carismáticas y lo mejor de todo: cada una de ellas tiene una actividad económica. Los integrantes comentan que el nombre lo eligieron por una novela mexicana muy famosa. Las integrantes y sus actividades son: 

Mary Cruz- Venta De Perfumes Y Abarrotes
Cristal-Estilista
Gloria-Venta De Refrescos
Irma- Venta De Ropa
Antonio-Servicio Mecanico 
Enriqueta-Cria Y Venta De Cerdos 
Sandra-Calzado Por Catalogo 

Cristal es una persona muy trabajadora, amable, carismática, alegre y comprensible la cual desde hace ya 15 años se ha dedicado al servicio de estilista aunque en un principio desempeñó su actividad en Estados Unidos pues fue el lugar donde aprendió la actividad. Hace algunos años regreso a México para cuidar a su madre quien vivía sola y enfermó. Ahora Cristal vive con ella y trabaja de lunes a sábado de 8 am a 6pm. Ella cumplió su sueño de estar en un país extranjero y ahora está concentrada en el bienestar y felicidad de su madre quien es la mejor motivación para continuar con su trabajo. La estética de Cristal ha funcionado desde hace siete años, la cual ha ido adecuando y ampliando para ofrecer un mejor servicio; ella sigue trabajando por citas para realizar cortes de cabello, teñir, peinar, etc y su agenda siempre está llena pues siempre la buscan, especialmente si hay algún evento. 

Cristal necesita comprar tintes, peróxido, cera, peines, pasadores, crema, capas, tijeras, y de esta manera tener más producto para continuar trabajando.

"Gracias a los compañeros del grupo por invitarme a formar parte de ellos y de esta manera ampliar mi estética" fueron las palabras de Cristal.

*En la imagen: Cristal viste blusa negra y pantalón de mezclilla.
texts.en:
To get to the place where the Briso de Mar group lives, you have to travel 30-35 minutes by bus. During the journey you can see kilometers of sugar cane plantations and a few houses. Other crops are grown but they are mainly for consumption by the family. Sugar cane is the main source of income for the local people. Worth mentioning too is the sugar factory that is the main source of employment especially during the sugar cane harvest.

Brisa de Mar is made up of seven people, all hardworking, kind, friendly, charismatic, in fact the best of everything. Each person has her/his own business. The group's name was chosen because it is the name of a very famous Mexican novel.

Here are the names of the members and their jobs:
Mary Cruz--sells perfume and groceries
Cristal--beauty salon
Gloria--sells soft drinks
Irma--sells clothing
Antonio--mechanic
Enriqueta--raises and sells pigs
Sandra--sells footwear from a catalog

Cristal is a very hardworking, friendly, charismatic, lively and easy to understand person. Since she was 15 years old she has been a hair stylist, working at one time in the USA where she learned about hairdressing. A few years ago she returned to Mexico to look after her mother who was ill and living alone. Now Crystal lives with her. She works from 8am to 6 pm. Her dream had been to live overseas, a dream she has now accomplished. She is now concentrating on her mother's wellbeing and happiness. This is her main motivation for working so hard.

Crystal's salon has been running for seven years, and in that time she has improved and expanded it. She accepts appointments for hair cuts, colour, and hair styles--and her appointments book is always full especially if there is a special event.

Cristal needs to buy dyes, peroxide, wax, combs, bobby pins, lotions, capes and scissors. Then she will be able to continue her work. "I thank my friends in the group for inviting me to join them so that I can grow my business," says Crystal.

loans.use: Buy dyes, peroxide, wax, combs, bobby pins, lotions, capes and scissors

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Alina

texts.ru: Алина, 30 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Алина занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав с суммы 10,000 сом (KGS) более 10 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Алины на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 2 лошади и 20 овец. Также у Алины есть 1,20 ГА собственной земельной доли, на которой она выращивает фасоль, клевер. Также Алина реализует молоко, в среднем около 16 литров в день. Ежемесячная прибыль Алины составляет около 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме  100,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка 20 овец. Доходы от кредита Алина планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, также планирует построить новый дом для своей семьи.
texts.en:
Alina is 30 years old, married, and the mother of three children. Alina works with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation, after having started with an amount of 10,000 som (KGS) more than 10 years ago. 

Thanks to Alina's persistent work, her farm currently has two cows, two horses and 20 sheep. Alina also has 1.20 hectares of own land, on which she grows haricots and clover. Alina also sells milk, on average around 16 liters per day. Alina's monthly income is around 16,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, she turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS), with which she will purchase 20 sheep. Alina plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her business. She also plans to build a new house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase 20 sheep

loans.name: Seinepbu

texts.ru: Сейнепбу успешно выплатила предыдущий кредит, она очень благодарна всем инвесторам Кива, которые помогли ей в финансировании. Кредит был использован по назначению. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Сейнепбу есть 3 дойные коровы, 1 нетель и 15 овец, также на земельном наделе мерою 0,70 Га она выращивает кукурузу и клевер для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Сейнепбу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят и овец. Доходы от кредита позволят Сейнепбу и в дальнейшем увеличивать поголовье скота.
texts.en: Seinepbu has successfully repaid her prior loan. She is truly thankful to all Kiva lenders who  helped with the financing. Her loan was used as intended. At presented Seinepbu’s farm includes three dairy cows, one heifer and 15 sheep. She also has a land plot of 0.7 ha [1.7 acres], where she grows corn and clover for use on the farm as well as for sale. Seinepbu has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 130,000 KGS to buy calves and sheep. The revenue from her loan will allow Seinepbu to keep increasing her livestock headcount.

loans.use: to purchase calves and sheep.

loans.name: Matilde Reyna

texts.es:
Matilde de 51 años de edad, quiere en un futuro que sus hijos tengan una carrera universitaria y también tener una tienda más grande en el cantón. 

 Matilde cuanta con gran experiencia en la venta, ya que tiene una pequeña tienda de donde se sustentan para sacar adelante con la alimentación y estudio de sus hijos.  Actualmente vive con su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura y también vive con ella 4 hijos de los cuales 3 estudian y a la vez le ayudan con las ventas en su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar Bebidas, golosinas, arroz, azúcar, aceite, etc. para la tienda. Con el préstamo pretende diversificar su tienda y así poder ofrecer más productos a sus clientes y poder tener más ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Matilde, age 51, would like to have a future in which her children obtain their university degrees. In addition, she would like to have a larger store in her canton.

Matilde has a great deal of experience in sales. She already has a small store that helps her to provide food and an education for her children. Matilde lives with her husband, who is a farmer. They have four children, three of whom are in school and the other one helps with making sales from their house.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy beverages, snack foods, rice, sugar, oil, and other products for her store. With this loan, she intends to diversify her store so that she can offer more products to her customers and generate more income for sustaining her family.

loans.use: to buy beverages, snack foods, rice, sugar, oil, and other products for her store.

loans.name: Lismery

texts.es:
Lismery es una joven estudiante de medicina, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos, esta es su historia:Mi nombre es Lismery, tengo 16 años de edad. Recientemente terminé el bachillerato y voy a iniciar la universidad. Nací en Santo Domingo, República Dominicana y actualmente resido en La Caleta,  Boca Chica junto a mis padres y mis 5 hermanos de los cuales soy la mayor. Mi madre trabaja en una casa como niñera y mi padre tiene una zapatería.
Quiero estudiar en la Universidad Central del Este (UCE) en la cual recibí una beca completa cubriendo el costo de la matricula por mi alto índice académico. La carrera que voy a estudiar es Medicina porque es una profesión muy importante y es con la que me identifico.
Necesito este préstamo para cubrir los gastos de manutención como pasajes, libro, comida, etc. ya que los recursos financieros de los cuales depende mi familia son insuficientes para cubrir los mismos. El monto de dinero para realizar mis estudios completos asciende a 385,000.00. Si no tuviera la oportunidad de recibir este préstamo una gran parte de mi vida se vería afectada ya que me atrasaría en los estudios por inasistencia y hasta perdería la beca, por lo que mis metas y sueños se verían  troncados.
Las metas que tengo son ser una excelente médico cirujana y sobre todo ayudar a mi familia económicamente. Me gustaría trabajar en el sector público, pero también quisiera tener una clínica privada y una institución de ayuda para personas de escasos recursos.
texts.en:
Lismery is a young medical student. She is requesting a loan to cover her expenses and this is her story: 

My name is Lismery. I am 16-years-old. I recently graduated from high school and am going to start university. I was born in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic and I currently reside in La Caleta, Boca Chica with my parents and my five siblings of which I am the oldest. My mother works as a nanny in a house and my father owns a shoe store. I want to study at the University Central del Este (UCE) at which I received a full scholarship covering the cost of my tuition because of my very high GPA. I am going to study medicine because it is a very important profession with which I identify.

I need this loan to cover living expenses such as travel, books, food, and more as financial resources that my family depends on are insufficient to cover these costs. The amount of money for my complete studies amounts to 385,000.00 [Dominican pesos]. If I had the opportunity to receive this loan, a big part of my life would be affected because it would prevent me from delaying my studies or even losing the scholarship. My dreams and goals would be cut short. 

The goals I have are to be an excellent doctor and surgeon. I especially want to help my family financially. I would like to work in the public sector but I also want to have a private practice and an institution to help poor people.

loans.use: to pay costs related to her university education in medicine

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a 33-year-old married man with three children aged 4, 2, 1 with only one child attending school. He is a farmer who grows bananas, beans, coffee for sale and home consumption. He works for six days a week and 10 hours a day and has been a farmer since 2005. He also operates a retail shop to supplement the family income.

He was motivated by the profitability of the business and the desire to earn a living. He is also a teacher, from which he gets an additional income to support his family. He hopes to use the loan to buy seedlings (coffee) and mulch and also to buy fertilizers for his gardens.

His hopes and dreams are to buy a car and renovate his residence. He however faces challenges of unfavorable weather conditions like drought and crop pests and diseases that affect his crops. He is described as honest and hardworking in business.

loans.use: To buy seedlings and fertilizers

loans.name: Jardines De La Luz Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “JARDINES DE LA LUZ”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dora ella es viuda y tiene 62 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de artesania, la socia vende  tejidos, chompas, mantas y telares, la socia vende diferentes tejidos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos, chompas y telares.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tortas, negocio de imprenta, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de cosméticos.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members are part of the Communal Bank named “Jardines de La Luz” (Gardens of the Light), which is located in the District of Cusco in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

One of the members is Sra. Dora. She is 62 years old, widowed, and has five children. Dora works at her craft business where she sells woven articles, sweaters, blankets, and looms. She sells different types of woven articles. Dora works from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. She has been in this business for eight years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her business of selling woven articles and looms. She is requesting a loan in order to buy woven articles, sweaters, and looms.

The members who appear in the attached photos had their pictures taken after the meeting because they requested permission to arrive late because of work reasons. The other members have businesses such as selling cakes, operating a print shop, managing a grocery store, and selling cosmetics.

Dora appreciates those who have helped to fulfill her dream in this manner, so she promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy woven articles, sweaters, and looms.

loans.name: Gladys Elena

texts.es:
Gladys una mujer de un ímpetu y fortaleza mental admirable que a sus 33 años cuenta con una tienda de productos de la canasta familiar la cual monto y fortaleció y la saco adelante sola.
Es madre de un hijo de 11 años de edad por el cual se preocupa pues siempre tiene en mente que podrá ser de este niño cuando tenga más edad cual será el futuro estudiara, será responsable todas aquellas dudas que aquejan una madre, pero ella trabajando y brindándole afecto hará de este una persona de bien para la sociedad que es su gran objetivo. 
Quiere solicitar un crédito el cual invertirá en variedad de productos de la canasta familiar buscando fidelizar más clientes y obtener mejores ingresos apra mantener a su familia,( madre y padre y a su hijo).
texts.en:
Gladys is a woman with admirable mental strength and momentum.  At age 33, she has a grocery store that she started and set up on her own.

She is the mother of an 11 year old son and worries about him and thinks about how he will be when he is older.  He will study, be responsible, and all the things that mothers think about.  However, by her working and providing for him, he will become a person of means in society; her greatest goal.

She is asking for a loan to buy a variety of products so she can win more customers and increase her income with which to support her family (mother, father, and son).

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes for her store

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en: Merlyn, 56, is married with three adult-age children. Her major source of income is buying and selling grocery items. She has been in this business for 21 years already. The business helped her meet her family's financial needs, especially the education of her children until they graduated and got jobs. She is still continuing the business because it provides good income due to her loyal customers. Someday, she will have a legacy to leave to her children. Her plan is to maintain her inventory so that her customers will be served well. She is still planning for a business expansion for the good of her children and even her grandchildren. She already availed loans previously to purchase additional stocks and now she is re-applying for a new loan for her store.

loans.use: To purchase additional items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Martha Luz

texts.es:
Martha de 38 años de edad, es ama de casa, es madre soltera pero una mujer muy trabajadora que apesar de las dificultades de la vida a logrado sacar adelante a su hijo. Martha se dedica a la elaboracion de quesos frescos y cuajada ella vende por pedidos y tambien sale a vender por la comunidad, ademas aprovecha la oportunidad de ofrecer productos de belleza a sus clientes como: perfumes, cosmeticos, accesorios, estos son productos de catalago.

En este momento necesita invertir en sus pequeños negocios, ya que tiene varios pedidos de sus clientes que viajan a los Estados Unidos y llevan quesos frescos a sus familiares. Especificamente comprara leche para elaborar más quesos frescos y perfumes, cosmeticos y accesorios.

El sueño de Martha es seguir trabajando para que a su hijo no le falte nada.
texts.en:
Martha is 38 years old. She is a homemaker, a single mother, and also a hardworking woman. Despite the difficulties in her life, she has been able to move forward on behalf of her son. Martha produces fresh cheeses and curds and sells these products on request and also by traveling through her community. She also takes advantage of these opportunities to sell beauty products to her customers such as perfumes, cosmetics, and accessories that are offered through catalogs.

At the moment, Martha needs to invest in her small businesses. She has several orders from customers who will be traveling to the United States and want to bring fresh cheeses for their relatives. Specifically, Martha will buy milk for making fresh cheeses. She will also be purchasing perfumes, cosmetics, and accessories. Her dream is to continue working so that her son will lack nothing.

loans.use: to buy milk for making fresh cheeses and also perfumes, cosmetics, and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en: Lilian is a fifty-four-year-old married woman with six children living in Kasese-Uganda. She sells charcoal and has been in business for three years; and also operates a boutique for clothes, a bar, and lodges to get side income. She is faced with a challenge of government laws protecting forests. Lilian is a hard working woman with the ability of running multiple businesses in order to earn a living. Lillian wants the loan to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
This is Noemi. She is 33 and a resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Schubert, a driver, and mother to her children. Along with her husband, Noemi manages her household while operating a water distribution business. She works hard to continuously provide income for her everyday expenses. Noemi sells five-gallon containers of water for a profit. Her customers are her neighbors and local community members. She earns a minimum of 700 PHP in sales every day.

Noemi is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to expand her water business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands. Noemi hopes to prosper and have a bigger water station someday. She also desires to provide the best education possible for her children. Noemi meets up with weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy water needed to sell for her business

loans.name: Nyesi

texts.en: Nyesi is 32 years old, married with two children, and lives in Kasese, Uganda. She has been operating a bitenge (African garment similar to sarong) shop alongside farming to earn a living in order to sustain her family. Nyesi is a hard working woman faced with a challenge of competition and limited capital. Business expansion is Nyesi's dream. Nyesi wants money to buy bitenge to sell.

loans.use: to buy garments to sell.

loans.name: Michaeline

texts.en: Michaeline is a 44-year-old married woman with three children, living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling clothes for eleven years and does farming in order to earn additional income. She started her business in order to educate her children and improve their standard of living. Ever-changing customer preferences and inadequate capital pose a challenge to her business growth while her desire is to own a modern boutique that keeps up with the trends. Michaeline is requesting a loan to buy clothes to sell in order to meet customer demands.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is married and a mother of four children, two of whom still attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past ten years, she has operated a fish selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation in her place of operation. 

Mwanajuma is requesting a loan of Kes 20,000 to purchase more fish for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for resale.

loans.name: Abner Abel

texts.es:
Tener un gran restaurante es el deseo que tiene el señor Abner toda su vida y es que en ocasiones no puede dormir de imaginarse atendiendo su restaurante, pero él sabe que todo es paso a paso y necesita tener recursos para proyectar este sueño, por dicha razón comenzara con un puesto de comidas rápidas.
Abner es un hombre separado de su esposa, hace poco volvió al país pues su hijo le hace mucha falta y quiere estar cerca de este. 
Solicita un crédito el cual invertirá en surtido para comidas rápidas ya que tiene los activos pero no tiene la materia prima para iniciar y con la ayuda de este crédito podrá darle inicio  a su negocio esperando tener éxito para un día inaugurar su tan anhelado restaurante
texts.en:
Having a restaurant has been Sr. Abner’s wish his entire life. Occasionally he is not able to sleep because he is imagining about managing his restaurant. However, he knows that everything must happen one step at a time. He needs the resources to carry out his dream, which is why he has decided to open a fast food stand.

Abner is separated from his wife, who recently returned to the country because their son is in great need and wants her to be nearby. He is requesting a loan so that he can invest in inventory for his fast food business. He has the equipment, but he does not have supplies for getting started. With this loan, Abner will be able to start his business, which he hopes will be successful so that one day he can open his long-awaited restaurant.

loans.use: to buy supplies for opening a fast food stand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in her small mobile business

loans.name: Edson

texts.en:
A resident of Kasese, Uganda, Edson is 29 years of age, married, and the father of four children. For 12 years, he has been operating a retail shop selling general merchandise and fruits and vegetables, the income from which goes toward looking after his family.

Edson is requesting a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. He hopes to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Herber Ramiro

texts.es:
Herber de 26 años de edad, estudia cuarto año de licenciatura en sistemas informáticos en la universidad, se ha criado con sus hermanos y su padre que se dedican a la agricultura.

Herber estudia los fines de semana, para pagarse sus estudios tiene que trabajar de lunes a viernes en una tienda, también reciben el apoyo de sus padres, anteriormente trabajaba en una venta de celulares pero tuvo que buscar el trabajo actual para estudiar al mismo tiempo.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar una motocicleta, él ya tiene una parte del dinero pero necesita complementar con el crédito. De esta forma podrá transportarse más rápido a su trabajo y a la universidad.

Él sueña con terminar sus estudios y también con sus pequeños ahorros montar una empresa de venta de computadoras y accesorios de oficinas y además quiere apoyar a sus padres a hacer unas mejoras en la vivienda.
texts.en:
Herber is 26 years old. He is studying in his fourth year at the university toward a degree in Information Systems. He grew up alongside his siblings and his father works in agriculture.

Herber studies on the weekends, so in order to pay for his education, he must work at a store Monday through Friday. He also receives support from his parents. Herber previously worked at a mobile phone shop, but he was able to find his current job because it allows him to study at the same time.

Herber needs a loan in order to buy a motorcycle. He already has part of the money that he needs, which will complement this loan. A motorcycle will enable him to get to his job and to the university faster. He dreams of finishing his studies and also of setting aside a small amount of savings so that he can open a business where he can sell computers and office accessories. In addition, he wants to help his parents by making a few improvements to their home.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for traveling to work and school.

loans.name: Felipe De Jesús

texts.es:
Felipe de 62 años de edad, está casado y tiene tres hijos lo cuales ya son mayores de edad y solo uno vive en casa

Felipe se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde muy pequeño, ya que sus padres no pudieron mandarlo a estudiar y solo le enseñaron a trabajar, pero le ha servido para mantener a su familia.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes ya que necesita que su cultivo se desarrolle bien para que sea rentable.

Sus planes son cultivar tres hectáreas de terreno que posee para obtener unos mejores resultados y mejorar su ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Felipe is 62 years old. He is married and has three children that are already grown. Only one of them lives in his house. 

Felipe has worked in farming since he was very young. His parents couldn’t send him to school and only taught him to work, but this has served him well by allowing him to support his family.  

He needs this loan to buy fertilizers, because he needs his crop to develop well so it will be profitable. 

His plan is to plant three hectares of land that he owns to obtain better results and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, because he needs his crop to develop well so it will be profitable

loans.name: Claudia Marisol

texts.es:
Claudia tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar pero aprendió a leer y escribir por medio de unos cursos.

Claudia se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos de desde pequeña, hace tres años junto a su esposo ha logrado montar una tienda de la cual obtiene la mayor fuente de ingresos para los gastos del hogar.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar productos para su tienda ya que necesita surtirla mas, pues en ocasiones no tiene lo que sus clientes buscan y desea cubrir esa necesidad.

Ella sueña con tener una tienda bien surtida con todos los productos que demandan sus clientes.
texts.en:
Claudia is 34 years old and lives with her husband and their two children. She didn't have the opportunity to go to school, but she learned to read and write after taking some classes.

Claudia has worked doing the household duties since she was little. Together with her husband, they started a store three years ago, which is their household's biggest source of income.

She needs the loan to buy products for her store to have it better stocked because on occasion she doesn't have what her customers are looking for and she'd like to be able to.

She dreams of having a well-stocked store with every product her customers ask for.

loans.use: to buy products for her store to have it better stocked because on occasion she doesn't have what her customers are looking for and she'd like to be able to.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to raise chickens

loans.name: Wiston

texts.en:
Wiston is an old client, aged 43 years old, dealing in agriculture. He wants to improve it so that he can increase his income, but he is lacking enough money to buy manure and hire labor. 

That’s why he has come to UGAFODE for a loan. He hopes that it can change his way of living and that he can harvest more matooke (green plantain). He applied for a loan of 2,000,000 UGX. He is thankful for the UGAFODE services.

loans.use: to buy organic manure and hire labour.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is married and has four children who are still young for school. She owns a house that has neither piped water nor electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For over four years, she has operated a tailoring business, making garments for both men and women. She cites seasonality as her major challenge. Fatuma dreams of establishing a boutique in the near future.

With the KES 15,000, she wants to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a thirty-six year old, married man with four children, living Kasese Uganda. Three of the children go to school.

He has been in the agriculture business for fifteen years. He also sells produce such as maize beans and Ground nuts to get a side income. He went into this business with an aim of improving his standard of living but is faced with the challenges of price fluctuations of agricultural products and poor weather. His dream is to become a great farmer in his area, growing cash crops.  

Moses has asked for a loan to buy farm inputs.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Bughoye Thuyihimbe Group

texts.en:
Oliver is a female, aged thirty years. She is married with six children and lives in Kasese, Uganda. She is a member of Bughoye Thuyikorere Group, where members guarantee each other so as to access credit. 

She operates a retail shop of general merchandise, a business she has been in for fourteen years. She began the business to raise income for the family. Limited capital and price fluctuations are her major challenges. 

Oliver has a dream of expanding her business and making more profits. She wants money to buy cassava flour and beans for selling.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour and beans for selling.

loans.name: Aida Sofia

texts.es:
Aida una mujer de gran fortaleza y ganas de salir adelante, la cual tuvo que pasar por una difícil etapa de su vida, separarse de su esposo con el cual tuvo dos hijos que tienen hoy en día 15y 13 años de edad. 
Aida a pesar de esta difícil situación no se dejó caer y persevero, saco a sus hijos adelante.
Quiere solicitar un crédito para comprar una maquina fileteadora y seguir demostrándole a sus hijos y familia que la disposiciones y las buenas energías, amor  y ganas para hacer las cosas siempre tienen un buen resultado.
texts.en:
Aida is a strong woman who would like to get ahead. She had to go through a difficult time in her life, separating from her husband with whom she has two children- a 15-year-old and a 13-year-old. 

Aida never stopped perservering in spite of her difficult situation and moved her children forward.

She's asking for a loan to buy a sewing machine to keep demonstrating to her children and family that with the will, good energy, love and desire to do things, it will always turn out well.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to keep progressing as a mother and head of her household.

loans.name: Ramzana

texts.en:
Ramzana is a 48-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and seven children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Ramzana's son has been driving an auto rickshaw in Lahore for many years but now his rickshaw’s body and engine are fully damaged. He has sold his rickshaw to a scrap dealer for a very low price. He now wants to buy a new auto rickshaw but is still short of the full amount.

Ramzana's son is unable to earn even a single penny for his family without a rickshaw. Ramzana has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With this loan amount, her son can easily buy a new rickshaw. Ramzana and her son thank Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her son.

loans.name: Marlene Esmeralda

texts.es: Marlene de 22 años de edad habita en vivienda propia desde hace 3 años. Ella es una joven admirada en su comunidad por ser trabajadora y amigable, Marlene ha trabajado desde muy joven para superarse y comprar sus pocas pertenencias, actualmente se dedica a la venta de teléfonos celulares y sus diferentes accesorios para lo que anteriormente solicitó un crédito para invertir en su negocio quedando muy agradecida por los resultados obtenidos y es por ello que solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: teléfonos, carcasas, cargadores, etc.
texts.en: Marlene, age 22, has lived in her own home for three years. She is a young woman who is admired in her community for being hard-working and friendly. Marlene has worked from a very young age to get ahead and buy her few belongings. She currently sells cell phones and cell accessories. She requested a loan previously to invest in her business and is very grateful for the results she obtained. For this reason, she is requesting a new loan from FUSAI to invest in phones, cases, chargers, etc.

loans.use: to buy phones, cases, charters, etc.

loans.name: Tam's Group

texts.en:
Tam is a dynamic woman who was born in 1959. She has two children who are married. Tam’s husband is retired while she runs a cloth shop for a living. 

Tam has been a good participant of SEDA’s program since 2010. She has successfully repaid a loan of VND 8,938,000. Because of capital shortage, this time, Tam would like to borrow VND 11,118,000 to buy more clothes for her shop. She wishes to get enough money to invest her business and buy needed furniture for her family. 

Other members of Tam’s group are included in the following list: 
1. Hien is 62 years old. She is requesting a loan of VND 9,374,000 to sell clothes. 
2. Dung is 32 years old. She has two children. She would like to borrow VND 9,374,000 to make tofu and sell at the market. 
3. The is 51 years old. He is the father of one. He is applying a loan of 9,374,000 buy tools for repairing – vehicle store. 
4. Nhan is 37 years old. She is a dynamic woman and has two children. She is requesting a loan of VND 9,374,000 to sew clothing.
5. Thuy is 30 years old and has two children. She wants to borrow VND 5,014,000 to sell beverages.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for her shop

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 40 years old, married, and together with her spouse they have been blessed with two children. She is a dairy farmer and has been in the business for ten years. Her spouse also provides additional income to support the family.

This is Margaret's fifth loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and she will use the loan to buy equipment for building a feeding trough for her dairy cattle. She will also buy more dairy feed. She will use the anticipated profits to repay her loan.

Margaret has repaid her previous loans successfully, and her future hopes are to grow her business and be able to cater to her family.

loans.use: To buy materials for building a feeding trough for her dairy cattle.

loans.name: Eliazar Alexander

texts.es:
Eliazar estudió hasta bachillerato, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo que aún no asiste a la escuela.

Eliazar  trabaja como promotor en una institución de salud, cuenta con cuatro años de experiencia laboral, él ingresó a este trabajo gracias a un amigo suyo. El lugar de trabajo le queda a 5 kilómetros, por lo que el recorrido lo hace en bus, se levanta a las 5:00 AM para preparase y abordar el bus, su horario de trabajo es 7:00 AM a 4:00 PM. 
	
Él necesita el crédito para reparar una parte del techo de su casa, ya que el agua ingresa a cuando llueve, necesita comprar lámina, teja y pagará mano de obra.

Él sueña con tener lo ms necesario para su familia y seguir mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en:
Eliazar studied through high school. He is married and his wife is a homemaker. He has one son that doesn't go to school yet.

Eliazar works as a developer in a health institution, and has four years of experience doing this. He started this job thanks to a friend of his. It is five kilometers away and he takes the bus to get to work. He wakes up at 5:00 am to get ready and get on the bus. His work schedule is from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm. 

He needs the loan to repair part of the roof of his house because it leaks when it rains. He needs to buy sheets and tiles, and to pay for the labor.

He dreams of fulfilling all of this family's needs and to continue making home improvements.

loans.use: to repair part of the roof of his house because it leaks when it rains. He needs to buy sheets and tiles, and to pay for the labor.

loans.name: Nyasura Bunda Group

texts.en:
Magdarena, who is in her late twenties, is married and has two children, a boy and a girl, one schooling and another still young.

Magdarena has seen how most women suffer in her community, so together with three other women decided to engage in small businesses so as to get out of old thinking (depending on a man). She is now doing great and she helps her husband with the family welfare. Her husband finds so much potential and appreciates what Magdarena is doing. She runs a general store selling more varieties of items; sugar, sweets, sodas, water, maize and baking flour, cooking oil, etc. Magdarena has been in this enterprise for six years now, working from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm daily. She is able to generate a good monthly profit.

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this is her second credit request to be apportioned among Nyasura Bunda's, four group members. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. She used the previous credit, which she paid back successfully, to purchase shop inventory; cooking oil, rice, maize and baking flour. Magdarena earned an extra income which she used to reinvest in her shop to grow and covered the welfare cost for her family. She is so proud with Kiva's support, she has seen her business now improving.

She will invest her credit to purchase stock for her shop to resell. Her desire is to grow her business to wholesale prices.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her shop to resell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
This is Susan, 59, resident of Cabrera, Pasay, Philippines. She manages her household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.

Susan operates a house rental business. It is rented on a monthly basis. Susan also sells frozen and processed foods for additional income. She earns a minimum of PHP 15,000 (Philippine pesos) in sales every month.

To help her continue operations of her business, Susan is requesting a PHP 11,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan for the repair and maintenance of her room for rent. 

Susan hopes to be able to have her renovation soon. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her room for rent.

loans.name: Bolivia Group

texts.es:
Elvira es una mujer de 27 años de edad, solera, tiene dos hijos de cinco y nueve años, y su negocio es la venta ambulante comida.
Ella es independiente, emprendedora, trabajadora, buena madre y muy responsable. Su trabajo lo desarrolla en la zona sur de su ciudad, un lugar caracterizado por el creciente desarrollo del comercio en todas las áreas.
Elvira es de tez trigueña, cabello largo castaño, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el español y conoce el guaraní por herencia familiar.(segunda de la derecha, parada, blusa a rayas coloridas verticales) Su labor es la venta ambulante de comida, ella se encarga de preparar empanadas de queso, cuñapes (tortilla a base de queso), tojorí (refresco de maíz) y otros para venderlos en diferentes ferias y mercados en forma ambulante, también asiste a los partidos de fútbol ofreciendo refrescos y otras bebidas naturales. El deseo de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia la ha llevado a conformar una banca de personas con actividades diferentes pero necesidades similares para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus ingresos económicos. Su vida la comparte junto a sus dos hijos que asisten a la escuela y de vez en cuando la acompañan a trabajar. Su sueño es tener un restaurante con muchos clientes y mucha demanda. Las dificultades por las que atraviesa son diarias, como atravesar largas distancias cargada de sus ollas o canastas, las ventajas que tiene es que sus comidas se venden rápido y no tiene que esperar mucho tiempo.
Es por esos motivos que Elvira solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de cocina por mayor y aumentar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Elvira is a 27-year-old woman, single, and has two children ages five and nine. She sells food on the street.
She is independent, enterprising, hard-working, very responsible, and a good mother. She works in the southern zone of her city, an area characterized by the growing development of commerce everywhere.
Elvira has olive-coloured skin, long chestnut-coloured hair, and is of average height. Her mother tongue is Spanish and she knows Guaraní because of her family. She is located second from the right, standing up, wearing a shirt with vertical coloured stripes. She sells food on the street. She makes cheese empanadas and cuñapes (cheese tortillas), tojorí (a corn-based drink) and other dishes to sell in the various markets and on the street. She also goes to soccer games to sell pop and natural drinks. She wants to improve her family's quality of life, and this has brought her to join a community bank with people whose jobs are varied but who share similar needs for loans to improve their incomes.
She shares her life with her two children who are in school and sometimes go with her to work. Her dream is to have a restaurant with many customers and high demand. Her challenges come daily, such as crossing large differences with her pans and baskets. Her advantages include the fact that her food sells quickly and she never has to wait very long.
For these reasons, Elvira is requesting a loan for the wholesale purchase of kitchen supplies and to increase her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase cooking supplies.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en:
Rachael is a 40-year-old, married woman with ten children, living in Kasese, Uganda. 

Rachael is in the farming business and she rears goats for extra income. She started the businesses to generate income for her family and to give support to her husband. Rachael hopes for success and to become a model farmer in her area, but competition and weather changes are challenges she is facing.

Rachael is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticide for her farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide for her farm.

loans.name: Santos Alexander

texts.es:
Santos de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta primer grado, está casado y su esposa cría gallinas, cerdos y atienda una tienda, tiene dos hijos que se encuentran estudiando.   

Santos se dedica a la agricultura, él siembra maíz, frijol y maicillo, el lugar donde cultiva es alquilado, la distancia que recorre para llegar al lugar es de 10 minutos a pie, además se dedica a la pesca, tiene cuatro años de realizar esta actividad, la cual aprendió observando como lo hacían sus amigos cuando lo invitaban a pescar. El horario de la pesca es de 7:00 pm a 11:00 pm, la distancia que recorre es de unos 4 kilómetros por lo que el recorrido lo realiza a caballo.

	
Él necesita el crédito para comprar materiales para elaborar un trasmallo para pescar, y así mejorar su forma de realizar el trabajo.

Su sueño es sacar adelante a sus hijos y esposa, le gustaría también convertirse en un gran vendedor de pescados.
texts.en:
Santos is 28 years old, has a first-grade education, is married, and his wife raises chickens and pigs and runs a store.  He has two children who are in school.  

Santos works in farming for a living; he grows corn, beans, and sorghum.  The place where he plants is rented; the distance he travels to get to that place is 10 minutes on foot.  He also fishes for a living; he has been doing this for four years and he learned it from observing when his friends invited him fishing.  His fishing schedule is from 7:00 pm to 11:00 pm; the distance he travels is around 4 km, which is why he makes the trip on horseback.

He needs this loan to buy materials to make a driftnet for fishing and thereby improve the way he carries out his work.  
	
His dream is to get his children and his wife ahead; he would also like to become a great fish seller.

loans.use: to buy materials to make a driftnet for fishing and thereby improve the way he carries out his work

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es: Ana es una señora casada, tiene 3 hijos de 12, 13 y 15 años de edad, su esposo se trabaja en la entrega de documentos puerta a puerta, Ana se dedica a la crianza de animales  desde que era muy joven ya que vive en el campo y esa es la actividad que les permite obtener ingresos, Ana necesita e crédito para comprar chanchos y mejorar su negocio, la aspiración de esta señora trabajadora es de  luchar día a día para que sus hijos sigan estudiando y en algún momento verles todo unos profesionales, y así puedan ingresar a trabajar.
texts.en:
Ana is a married woman. She has 3 children who are 12, 13, and 15 years old. Her husband works as door-to-door courier. She has earned a living raising animals since she was young because she lived on a farm; that is one job that allows someone to earn money.

Ana is requesting a loan to buy pigs to improve her business. The goal of this hard-working woman is to work day by day to allow her kids to continue studying and, at one time, have them look professional. This way they can enter the workforce.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Bertha Del Carmen

texts.es:
Bertha de 30 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora quien luchó por graduarse de sus estudios de bachillerato, actualmente está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la albañilería, tiene un hijo de 5 años el cual es por quien luchan día a día por darle lo mejor. 

Bertha tiene una pequeña tienda en la cual ha dedicado 7 años, aprendió este trabajo gracias a su mamá quien antes se dedicaba a este negocio, el negocio lo tiene en su lugar  de residencia y el horario que tiene para atención es de 7.30 AM a 7.00 PM.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar más productos para su negocio, comprará azúcar, aceite, frijoles, sal, arroz entre otros productos de la canasta básica.

Ella sueña con tener una gran tienda, ser una empresaria, llegar a establecerse y darle lo mejor a su hijo, y con la ayuda de Dios darle la educación que tanto él necesita para que un día llegue a ser un profesional.
texts.en:
Bertha is 30 years old; she is an enterprising woman who worked hard to finish her high school studies.  She is currently in a relationship and her partner works in construction for a living.  She has a son who is five and she works day after day to give him the best. 

Bertha has a small store that she has worked at for seven years; she learned this work thanks to her mom, who used to have this business.  Her business is in her home and her hours of operation are from 7:30 am to 7:00 pm.

She needs this loan to buy more products for her business; she will buy sugar, oil, beans, salt, and rice, among other staple products.
