La actividad que ella dignamente a desempeñado durante 4 años es la compraventa de abarrotería en la comunidad ya que es por medio de ella puede obtener un ingreso económico para su familia y una ganancia para mejora su condición de vida.

El uso respectivo que Maria le dará al préstamo que ella solicita es para compra de mercadería de abarrotería ya que para ella es de mucha importancia tener surtida su tienda ya que por medio de ello puede tener ingresos económicos importantes para el sostenimiento de su familia.

Ella es un buen ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de mujeres se decidieron unir a Maria para emprender el negocio de abarrotaría ya que se dieron cuenta de que deja muy buena ganancia y solo así mejorar las condiciones de sus familias en un futuro no muy lejano.

Los sueños de ella es que las condiciones de su familia sean las adecuadas para un futuro y es por eso que quiere compra dos molinos de nixtamal instalarlas en su comunidad y construir su propio local par no pagar arrendamiento de local.
texts.en:
She is 23 years old, single, native of the department of Suchitepéquez. She does an incredible effort, despite her age. She is an enterprising woman who says it is never too late to start developing and having a vision in the future to have a good life (Maria is the first on the left of the photograph). 
She has worked 4 years buying and selling at a grocery store in the community. This is her way to obtain financial income for her family and the earnings to improve her life situation. Maria will use the loan to buy merchandise for the grocery store because it is very important to have a well stocked store, since it is how she can have financial income to support her family. She is a role model in her community, and this is why a group of women decided to join Maria to work in the business of grocery store. They realized that they can earn well, and only like this they can improve their families' situation in the near future. Her dreams are for her family's situation to be adequate in the future, and this is why she wants to buy two nixtamal (tortilla maker) mills, install them in her community and build her own store so she does not have to pay rent.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for the grocery store.

loans.name: Marvin Evelio

texts.es:
Marvin de 25 años  de edad soltero con un hijo de tan solo tres meses de nacido, el es un joven emprendedor que está decidido a luchar en la vida y que no se deja por vencido por los obstáculos que se le presentan en la vida, el se ha dedicado a una de las profesiones más solemnes que existen en toda sociedad como lo es la docencia. 

La actividad que el realiza es docente en Suchitepéquez desde hace más de cinco años, pero lo ha sentido desde pequeño.  Sus alumnos lo esperan siempre cada mañana para que Marvin le imparta el saber de la vida para el desarrollo de su comunidad.

El motivo de la realización del préstamo es para la compra de terreno que el a anhelado tanto desde un tiempo atrás para  poder dejárselos a sus hijo en un futuro.

También la docencia le ha provisto una fuente económica para el sustento de su familia y de su comunidad.  Su sueño es poder dejar un terreno para sus hijos como herencia.  Además de darles estudios a sus hijos para que ellos lleguen a un grado profesional más alto en la sociedad y mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Marvin is 25 years old, single, with a 3 month old son. He is a young entrepreneur who has decided to fight in life, and not let himself be conquered by all the obstacles that confront him. He works in one of the most solemn professions that exists in society, which is teaching. 

He has worked as a teacher in Suchitepéquez for more than 5 years, but he has felt like a teacher since childhood. His students always wait for him every morning so that Marvin can impart to them his knowledge of the world for the development of his community. 

His motivation in asking for a loan is to buy a piece of land, which he has really longed for many years, in order to leave it to his children in the future. 

Also, teaching has brought him an economic source to sustain his family and his community. His dream is to be able to leave some land to his children as inheritance. In addition, he will give his children the ability to study so that they might get to a higher professional level in society and reach better opportunities.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Santos Blas

texts.es:
Santos de 39 años de edad, nunca asistió a una escuela por lo tanto no cuenta con un grado de educación, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a la elaboración de petates para comercializarlos, aun no tienen ningún hijo y económicamente de él solo depende su esposa.

Desde hace más de 3 años, Santos se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cultiva granos básicos para el consumo familiar, trabajo que aprendió de su padre, anteriormente era empleado de seguridad pero ahora solo se dedica a cultivar la tierra, él camina 40 minutos para llegar al lugar de trabajo en horarios de 5:00 am hasta las 3:00 pm y en ocasiones más tiempo dependiendo de la exigencia de las labores a realizar en el cultivo.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar abono para aplicarlo a su cultivo y obtener una buena cosecha que le genere buen ingreso por la venta de la misma, además podrá tener alimento disponible en su casa.

A futuro él piensa mejorar su vivienda, que sus hijos cuenten con lo necesario para poder gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos, 39, never went to school and therefore does not have a degree. He is in a relationship and his partner makes sleeping mats for sale. He does not have any children yet, and only his wife depends on him financially.

For more than three years, Santos has worked in agriculture. He grows basic grains for the family's consumption. He learned about this work from his father. Before, he was a security employee, but now he only works on the land. He walks for 40 minutes to reach the place where he works from 5:00am until 3:00pm. Sometimes, he works more depending on the demands of the labor to be done with the crops.

He needs this loan to buy fertilizer for his crops and to obtain a good harvest. He will earn a good income from the sale of his harvest. He will also have food for his household. 

In the future, he plans to improve his home so that his children will have what they need to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en: Rukhsana, 41 years old, is a very enthusiastic person who has been successfully running a small general store for many years. She offers a variety of daily-use products and has a good client base. In order to avoid shortages, Rukhsana needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customer demand. Rukhsana has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy additional grocery items, including oil, milk, sugar and juices. In this way, she will be able to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar and juices.

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en: Sughran is a 44-year-old married woman. She has 6 children. Her husband was the only income earner; she felt that she should support her husband to improve their financial condition so she started her own business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is in her 7th loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Qalib

texts.en:
Qalib is 57 years old and married with a son and two daughters. His wife is a housekeeper and takes care of the family. Qalib is a seller in a small local  shop. He sells bags, notebooks, pens, colorful books for scholars, some toys, umbrellas and balls. He has worked in this small business for 31 years and earns 300AZN monthly.

Now it’s a school period and things for scholars are in high demand.  Parents buy for their children many books, copybooks, pens, pencils, rubbers etc.  
Qalib’s old shop was located far from the center of the city and that’s why he didn’t have enough clients. Now he has moved close to the center but he hasn’t enough money to pay for the rent. He applied for a loan of 1000AZN in order to pay the rent for six months. He is a very positive man and loves children very much. He doesn’t want to lose business because he wants to see the children’s smiles and happy eyes when they buy toys and things they like.

loans.use: to pay rent for six months

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en:
Naheed is 38 years old. She is married and has two children. She has a small business selling animals. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She buys animals and then sells them at higher prices in the market. 

Naheed wants to increase her income. For this purpose, she has to buy more animals so she contacted Kashf Foundation for a loan of 50,000 PKR. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. This is Naheed's seventh loan cycle, and she has a good payment history.

loans.use: to buy more animals to sell

loans.name: Bahsiran

texts.en: Bahsiran is a 47-year-old married woman. She has 4 children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food and clothes. The man shown in this picture is her husband. She is successfully running a small general store with the help of her husband. They have 12 years of experience in this field. She assists her husband in purchasing stock of goods from market. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 50,000 to buy more packs of salt, biscuits and other eatables to meet the increasing demand in her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. It is her 5th loan cycle and she has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy more packs of salt, biscuits and other eatables

loans.name: Levis Joel

texts.es:
Levis es un hombre trabajador de 32 años de edad, está acompañado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, debido a la falta de recursos económicos él solo pudo estudiar hasta 8° grado, tiene una hija de 7 meses de edad y en casa de Levi también vive su mamá.

Él se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura desde que era un niño ya que su padre le enseñó este rubro, hace 5 años entró a trabajar en una fábrica de bloques, este trabajo lo realiza por la mañana, también se dedica a pintar  casas desde hace 2 años, él tiene varias fuentes de ingresos ya que es una persona luchadora y emprendedora con la visión de sacar adelante a su familia.

 El crédito lo necesita para comprar lámina para la construcción de una pequeña casa ya que él desea independizarse de su madre y tiene un pequeño terreno cerca de donde vive actualmente.
 
Él sueña con construir de un material más resistente su casa, donde su esposa y su hija tengan una mejor calidad de vida, más higiene y comodidad.
texts.en:
Levis is a 32-year old, hard-working man.  He is married and his wife takes care of their home.  Due to a low income, Levis was only able to go to school until 8th grade.  He has a 7-month old daughter and his mother lives with them as well. 

Levis has worked in agriculture since he was a boy; his father taught him the trade.  Five years ago, he started working in a block factory, which he does in the mornings.  For the last two years, he has also earned his living painting houses.  Levis has a number of sources of income, as he is a hard-working and enterprising person who aims to get his family ahead. 

Levis needs the loan to purchase galvanized sheet metal to build a small house.  He wants to live independently form his mother.  He has a small plot of land close to where he currently lives. 
 
Levis hopes to build a house from more durable materials, where his wife and daughter can have a better quality of life, improved hygiene and greater comfort.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal to build a small house.

loans.name: Dilsad

texts.en:
Dilsad is a 54-year-old married woman. She has a son and two daughters. Her husband is a seller. They rent a small shop and use it together. Dilsad has worked as a seller for 30 years and has good experience. She sells daily products, such as sugar, cookies, bread and flour, and such things as soap, wash powder, shampoo and so on. Her monthly income is 300 Azerbaijani manats (AZN).

Dilsad and her husband work in this local shop, and they have to pay rent every month. People visit their shop every day, but their income from sales is still low. This makes for a problem: they can’t cover family needs and rent payments.

Dilsad applied for a AZN 1,500 loan in order to supply more quality products. A big assortment will attract more clients and increase income from sales. After this, Dilsad and her husband will be able to cover the family's needs and pay for rent.

loans.use: to supply more quality products

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es:
Nelson de 30 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene dos hijos entre 6 y 8 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato y su compañera de vida se dedica  a los oficios domésticos.

Él maneja equipo de terracería, conocimientos que adquirió estudiando mecánica automotriz, ya tiene 3 años desempeñando ese trabajo y para llegar viaja una hora en bus, trabaja en un horario de  7:00 am a 4:00 pm.

Él necesita el crédito para pagar honorarios de un abogado que hará la escrituración de su casa.

Nelson sueña con seguir trabajando para educar a sus hijos y verlos crecer junto a su compañera de vida.
texts.en:
Nelson is 30-years old.  He his married and has two children who are between 6 and 8 years old.  Nelson got his high school diploma.  His wife is a  homemaker. 

Nelson drives heavy equipment, which he learned to do studying automotive mechanics.  He has been in that line of work for three years.  To get to work, Nelson travels by bus for an hour.  He works from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm.

Nelson needs the loan to pay legal fees to the lawyer who will draw up the papers for his house. 

Nelson hopes to keep working, to send his children to school and to, along with his wife, watch his children grow.

loans.use: to pay legal fees to the lawyer who will draw up the papers for his house.

loans.name: Perveen

texts.en: Perveen is a 50-year-old married woman. She has four children. As it was very difficult for her to meet her family's household needs with only the small income of her husband, she started her business selling cloth in her locality. She buys cloths of various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She is able to earn enough through her business. She is famous among her neighbors for her collections and has a good client list. She wants to grow her business so she is requesting a 50,000 PKR loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs. It will help her to grow her sales and consequently her profits.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Saima is a 34-year-old married woman. She has two children. Her husband had been the only earner in the family. It was very tough for Saima to manage her household needs with the small income of her husband. Therefore, she decided to help her husband in earning. For this purpose, she started her business in the cloth trade: she buys cloth of different varieties from different markets and sells to people in her area. Now she is playing a very important role in her family, and she wants to invest more in her business. 

Saima has requested a loan of 40,000 Pakistani rupees to purchase a variety of cloth in different colors, taking into account the taste and choice of her customers. It is her third loan cycle, and she has shown a good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of cloth in different colors

loans.name: Luis Ángel

texts.es:
Luis desde hace 10 años se dedica a la producción agrícola y diariamente se levanta para trabajar y atender sus tierras en las cuales tiene cultivos principalmente de café.

Es una actividad aprendida de manera empírica y poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando sus técnicas y habilidades en este campo.

Hoy en día se siente orgulloso de lo que ha podido construir con su esfuerzo y se siente muy agradecido con la vida por las oportunidades que le brinda.

El pide un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abonos, riegos y pesticidas, de este modo mantener sus tierras en optimas condiciones para los cultivos y así poder trabajar mejor. 

Su mayor sueño es tener una casa propia y allí poder disfrutar de su vejez al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Luis has been farming for 10 years. Every day he gets up for work and attends to the land on which he grows his crops, primarily coffee. He learned this trade through trial and error. Gradually he perfected his techniques and his skill in this trade. Today he is proud of what he has built through his own efforts and is very appreciative of the opportunities he has been given in life.

Luis is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of compost and pesticides, as well as pay for irrigation, so that he can keep his land in optimal condition for growing his crops. This will enable him to do his job better.

His greatest wish is to have his own house and to be able to enjoy retirement along with his wife.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, and other farming supplies, as well as pay for irrigation.

loans.name: Zubaida

texts.en: Zubaida is a 36-year-old married woman. She has been involved in the cloth trade for a period of about four years. She purchases cloth of different varieties at low prices from the city market and sells them in her own town. She has a strong customer base. Zubaida is in her fourth loan cycle and has requested a loan of 45,000 Pakistani rupees. She wants to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business. Zubaida expects a boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors

loans.name: Fredis Antonio

texts.es:
Fredis tiene 62 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado en la escuela, está casado y su esposa vende pupusas, tiene 3 hijos pero solo el menor vive en casa y estudia bachillerato.


Fredis se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, tiene seis años desempeñando dicha actividad, este trabajo lo realizaba su padre  y Fredis  aprendió a efectuarlo también. Además se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y a la siembra de granos básicos. El ganado lo vende los días sábados en el tianguis municipal y los demás días de la semana se dedica a sus cultivos, el lugar donde trabaja está a 3 km de su casa y viaja en pick up.


Él necesita el crédito para comprar ganado, criarlo y luego venderlo 

Su sueño es seguir adelante con sus negocios y que su hijo termine sus estudios y en un futuro logre ser preofesional.
texts.en:
Fredis is 62-years old.  He went to school until sixth grade.  He is married and his wife sells "pupusas," (stuffed tortillas).  He has three children, but only the youngest still lives at home; he is going to high school. 

Fredis makes his living buying and selling livestock.  He has been in the business for six years.  His father did this type of work, and now Fredis has learned it as well.  In addition, he earns his living raising pigs and planting staple grains.  He sells his livestock on Saturdays at the municipal street market.  The other days of the week Fredis dedicates to his crop, which are planted in an area 3 km. from his house.  He gets to work in a pick-up truck. 

Fredis needs the loan to purchase livestock to raise and later sell.  

His hope is to keep moving forward with his businesses and to see his son finish school and in the future become a professional.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to raise and later sell.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en: Mumtaz, a 46-year-old lady, has five children. Her husband (also shown in the photo) has been selling vegetables in his locality with Mumtaz’s assistance for the last 10 years. She uses the income to support her entire family. She is in her fifth loan cycle. Now Mumtaz has requested a loan of 40,000 Pakistani rupees. She intends to use this loan amount to buy vegetables, including onions, tomatoes, potatoes and ginger, to create a means of increasing revenue so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, including onions, tomatoes, potatoes and ginger.

loans.name: Las Samis Group

texts.es:
Marleny es una mujer de 36 años de edad, casada, madre un hijo de 10 años y su negocio es la venta de comida típica.
Ella es emprendedora, luchadora, constante, buena madre, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en ‘sacaba’ que es una población de clima cálido y medianamente seco caracterizado por sus famosas bebidas fermentadas de maíz, la ‘chicha’ y ‘garapiña’ con el dicho: ‘Sacaba donde la chicha no se acaba’.
Marleny es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el quechua el cual lo practica con la gente del lugar también habla español porque su clientes vienen de la ciudad.(de pie la primera de la derecha, saco negro) Su trabajo es la comida, ella cocina y su menú varía según el día por ejemplo lunes de; Pique Macho! plato hecho con chorizo frito, carne de lomo de res frita en su jugo, con papas fritas, y ensalada de tomate, cebolla y locoto y huevo duro cocido al agua rebanado en rodajas, todo servido en un plato, las papas fritas se sirven en el plato primero, luego se ponen la carne y el chorizo mezclados encima de la papa, y la ensalada y el huevo al final, y se le dice macho porque sus locotos son muy picantes.
Ella se dedica a la cocina desde muy niña porque su trabajo es herencia familiar, su sueño es tener un restaurante y desea ampliar su negocio realizando la compra de muebles, utensilios de cocina y también insumos de cocina por mayor.
Es por esos motivos que Marleny solicita un préstamo para la ampliación de su puesto de comida y cambiar su vida.
texts.en:
Marleny is a woman of 36. She is married and is the mother of a 10-year-old son. Her business is selling traditional food.

She is entrepreneurial, determined, persevering, a good mother, responsible, and very hard-working. She does her work in Sacaba, which is a town with a warm, moderately dry climate, characterized by its famous fermented corn beverages, "chicha" and "garapiña," and the slogan, "Sacaba, where the chicha never runs out."

Marleny has a dark complexion, medium height, and long black hair. Her mother tongue is Quechua, which she uses with the people in that place. She also speaks Spanish, because her customers come from the city. (She is standing, the first one on the right, in a black jacket.) Her business is food. She cooks, and her menu varies according to the day, for example, Monday: Pique Macho!, a dish made with fried sausage, beef fried in its juice, with french fries, tomato, onion and locoto (a spicy pepper) salad, and sliced hard-boiled eggs cooked in water, all served on a plate. The french fries are served on the plate first, then the meat is put on, and the sausage is mixed over the potatoes, and the salad and the egg at the end. It is called "macho" because the locotos are very spicy.

She has worked in cooking since she was a little girl, because her work is a family legacy. Her dream is to have a restaurant, and she wants to expand her business by buying furniture, cooking utensils, and also wholesale cooking ingredients.

It is for these reasons that Marleny is applying for a loan to expand her food stall and change her life.

loans.use: to expand her food stall and change her life

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan tiene 25 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo de seis años, quien estudia segundo grado en la escuela.


Juan se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 12 años, dicha actividad la aprendió de su padre, quien le inculcó el trabajo, gracias a su empeño hoy no se le dificulta ganarse la vida. Además se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y con ese trabajo obtiene ingresos extras para su familia, él trabaja de lunes a sábado y descansa los domingos.

 
Este crédito lo solicita para comprar insumos agrícolas tales como fertilizantes y plaguicidas para que sus cultivos crezcan fuertes y sanos y sea abundante.

Él sueña con incrementar la producción de granos básicos y su mayor deseo es ver a su hijo graduado y desempeñándose como un excelente profesional en la sociedad. Además, sueña con tener más hijos con su compañera de vida y quiere ser el mejor padre del mundo para sus pequeños.
texts.en:
Juan is 25-years old.  He went to school until 8th grade.  He is married and his wife is a homemaker.  Juan has a six-year old son who is in second grade at school. 

Juan has made his living in agriculture since he was twelve years old.  He learned the business from his father, who brought him into the work.  Thanks to his hard work, Juan has no trouble earning a living today.  In addition, he earns his living raising pigs.  This gives his family an extra income.  Juan works from Monday to Saturday and has Sundays off. 
 
Juan is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural supplies, like fertilizers and insecticides, to that his crops can grow strong, healthy and abundantly. 

Juan hopes to increase his production of staple grains.  His greatest desire is to see his son graduate and become an excellent professional in the community.  In addition, Juan hopes to have more children with his wife; he wants to be the best father in the work for his little ones.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies, such as fertilizers and insecticides, so his crop can grow strong, healthy and abundantly.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
Rosa de 36 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, está casada y su esposo es electricista, tiene 3 hijos que estudian 5°, 9° y bachillerato, con su pareja son los encardados de mantener a sus hijos, y nadie más vive con ellos. 

Desde hace 7 años Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa, aprendió por iniciativa propia,  anteriormente trabajaba en los oficios domésticos, ella viaja en bus al lugar donde vende la ropa y trabaja todo el día.

Ella necesita del crédito para comprar mercadería, específicamente camisa de hombres, mujer y de niños, faldas y ropa interior.

Sus sueños son que sus hijos se gradúen de una carrera profesional,  gozar de buena salud para seguir trabajando con el negocio y en un futuro tener un local en un mercado.
texts.en:
Rosa is 36 years old and studied through the ninth grade. She is married and her husband is an electrician. They have three children who are in fifth grade, ninth grade, and high school. She and her partner are responsible for raising their children. No one else lives with them.

Rosa has been selling clothes for seven years and learned the trade on her own. She previously worked in housekeeping. Rosa works every day and must travel by bus in order to reach the place where she sells clothes.

She needs a loan to buy merchandise, specifically skirts, undergarments, and shirts for men, women, and children. Her dreams include seeing her children graduate with a professional degree, enjoying good health so that she can continue working at her business, and having a shop at the market sometime in the future.

loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, and undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Josefina Estela

texts.es:
Josefina de 45 años de edad, está casada y su esposo es comerciante, en casa también vive una hijastra de Josefina..

Josefina es profesora y le apasiona dicha tarea porque tiene vocación para hacerlo, lleva cerca de 10 años desempeñándose en esta actividad, sus padres le inculcaron la importancia de estudiar y es esa la razón por la cual hoy se encuentra estable y entusiasmada  ejerciendo su profesión. 

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar un vehículo para transportar agua para el consumo porque donde viven no hay y la tienen que comprar en otro lugar lejano, y con ese medio se le facilitará más solventar esa necesidad.  

Josefina tiene sueños de superación para su vida, lo que más desea es tener siempre estable a su familia.
texts.en:
Josephina is 45 years old. She is married, and her husband is a store owner; her step daughter also lives in the house. 

Josephina is a teacher and she is passionate about the work because it is her vocation. She has been doing this for nearly 10 years. Her parents instilled in her the importance of studying, and that is the reason for being stable and enthusiastic in her profession today.

She needs the loan to buy a vehicle to transport potable water, because there is no potable water where they live, and they have to buy it far away. With this method, it will be easier for her to take care of this need.

Josephina dreams of improving her life, and she wants most for her family to be stable.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle to transport water for household use.

loans.name: Grisell Del Socorro

texts.es: Grisell se caso de muy joven, actualmente tiene 20 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos de 4 años y de 8 meses, junto a su esposo trabaja vendiendo de puerta en puerta de manera ambulante, ropa intima, cobertores, camisetas entre otros de estos ingresos sobreviven, requiere el apoyo de crédito para invertir con mas productos vendibles para poder aumentar sus ingresos y sacar adelante a sus hijos, Grisell comenta que ha tenido dificultades en la vida sobre todo cuando falleció su madre pero también se siente agradecida por el apoyo moral que siempre recibe de su padre.
texts.en:
Grisell was married at a young age, and is now 20 years old. She is mother to two children, ages 4 and 8 months. Along with her husband, she works selling underwear, bedspreads, and shirts - among other things - from door to door. With these earnings they survive. 

She requires the help of a loan to invest in more products to sell and to be able to increase her earnings so that she can move her children forward. Grisell says that she has had difficulties in life - especially when her mother passed away - but she also feels thankful for the moral support that she always receives from her father.

loans.use: to buy sheets, underwear for men and women, shirts, and more.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
La tierra ha sido bendecida por manos que les gusta trabajar y cuidarla.  Es un oficio digno de admirar el que hombres se dediquen por años y para toda la vida.  La tierra sin la labor de hombres campesinos dedicados al cultivo de la misma, no daría los frutos que sostienen generalmente a toda generación. Es el trabajo que realiza Manuel de 53 años soltero y que tiene 12 hijos los primeros 4 hijos de Manuel ya tienen familia separadas y los otros 2 hijos de el le  ayudan en el trabajo que el realiza y los últimos 6  son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de la comunidad donde viven.

La actividad que realiza Manuel todos los días bajo un sol agotador es la agricultura, el ha venido realizando dicha actividad durante 15 años, es la actividad que le ha generado ingresos económicos para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, el es un hombre con visiones y es por ello que el comercializa sus productos en los diferentes departamentos de su país.

El uso del préstamo es par la compra de fertilizantes, para poder obtener una muy buena cosecha, para tener un mejor ingreso económico para mejorar aún más las condiciones de vida de su familia y  comunidad. Uno de las más grandes aspiraciones de el es ver que sus hijos se conviertan en profesionales en los diferentes campos laborales y comprar terreno para dejar un bonito recuerdo para sus hijos.
texts.en:
The land has been blessed by hands that enjoy working and taking care of it.  It's a profession worth admiring and one that men dedicate years and even their whole lives to.  Land without a farmer's labor cultivating it wouldn't bear the fruits that sustain the generations.  This is the work that Manuel does.  He is 53-years old, single and has twelve children.  His first four children have their own families now, the next two help Manuel in his work, and the last six are excellent students at their community's school. 

Manuel works as a farmer every day under an exhausting sun.  He has done this work for fifteen years.  The work has generated an income that has improved his family's standard of living.  Manuel is a visionary, and that is why he sells his products in his country's various departments. 

The loan is intended for purchasing fertilizer so Manuel can get a good harvest and earn a better income.  He will then be able to improve his family's and his community's standard of living even further.  One of Manuel's greatest aspirations is to see his children become professionals in various work environments and to purchase a plot of land to leave his children something nice to remember him by.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Hovik

texts.en:
Hovik is 38 years old, and he lives in Kapan city of Syunik region. He has a higher education; he is a specialist in radio technology. He worked for many years at the Kapan city’s combine as a technician. Now he works at Kapan city’s unit as a communications specialist. Hovik is married, and he has two daughters. His wife works at the food market as a saleswoman. 

After his work, Hovik gives taxi services around his city in his own car. As he says, he likes his second job very much since it is a perfect occasion to meet old friends and relatives and chat with them during the trip. Hovik is a very cute man and he keeps his car always clean and in order, but, as he says, it demands great finances with which he now has some problems.

Since his taxi brings a significant part of his family income, he wants to keep it up. That is why he wants to do some repairs on it, getting prepared for the coming cold seasons so he can work with comfort and ease.

loans.use: to do some repairs on his car

loans.name: Tinatin

texts.en:
Tinatin is 45 years old, widowed and living in the small village of Gori District with her retired mother and two children. Tinatin owns an apple garden and sells fruits seasonally. Besides that, she produces hay for selling. Her young child gets monthly orphanage assistance from the local government (approximately $33 USD). 

As their existing income is very small and not enough to cover everyday expenses, Tinatin decided to re-start a trading business, which was stopped because of financial problems. She requested a loan from the local credit providers, but they usually demand some stable income from the borrowers. Tinatin’s credit requests were rejected several times, as she didn’t satisfy their requirements. 

She received this credit in the framework of joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, the so-called Startup Program that gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. With this loan of 1,000 GEL (Georgia lari), she will purchase fruits and vegetables at wholesale prices and resell them in her community door-to-door. She has five years of experience in this field from past times and thinks that the business will be profitable. It is obvious that the job is hard for Tinatin, but she is ready to deal with the vital difficulties and develop her business gradually. The Start Up credit will be a great support for the family, as their income will be significantly increased thanks to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to restart trading fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc in order to replace the roof of her house.

loans.name: Filomeno

texts.es:
Filomeno de 63 años de edad, no tuvo muchos estudios académicos, está acompañado y tiene dos hijos que ya son mayores de edad.

Filomeno se dedica a la agricultura, actividad que aprendió de sus abuelos quienes le enseñaron y adquirió experiencia en realizar esta actividad que se ha convertido en una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos, también se dedica al negocio de la ganadería los días viernes y sábado, también realiza crianza de cerdos y presta servicios de trasporte con un vehículo, esta actividad eventualmente lo acompaña su hijo mayor.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar ganado para venderlo posteriormente a un mejor precio.

Sus proyecciones para un futuro son que sus hijos sean profesionales, comprar un camión para la prestación de servicio de trasporte de carga pesada y  pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Filomeno, 63 years old, did not have much academic education, has a partner and two children who are already adults.

Filomeno works in agriculture, a job he learnt from his grandparents who taught him and he got experience in doing this work which then became one of his main sources of income, he also works in a cattle business on Friday and Saturday, he also raises pigs and provides transport services with a vehicle, in this job his oldest son ends up coming with him.

He needs this loan to buy cattle to later sell at a better price.

His projections for the future are that his children will be professionals, to buy a truck to offer transport services for heavy loads and to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to sell them later at a better price.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan tiene 48 años de edad, solo estudió hasta tercer grado por la situación económica y porque las escuelas estaban demasiado lejos, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 2 hijos que se encuentran estudian. 
 
Juan es albañil, lo aprendió por un curso que dieron en su comunidad, ya tiene 5 años de realizar esta actividad, además se dedica a la agricultura, crianza de cerdos y compra y venta de ganado lo cual lo aprendió de sus abuelos, estas son las principales fuentes de ingresos de Juan. 


 El crédito lo necesita para comprar 3 cerdos para criarlos y después venderlos a mejor precio, además comprará ganado.

 
Sus sueños son tener instalaciones más adecuadas para la crianza de cerdos y cuido de ganado, también terminar de pagar el crédito y adquirir otro para la compra de un camión que le facilite el traslado de los animales, también apoyar en los estudios de su hijos.
texts.en:
Juan is 48 years old and only studied until the third grade due to his economic circumstances and because the schools were too far away. He is in a relationship, and his partner takes care of domestic activities. He has two children who are studying.

Juan is a bricklayer. He learned the trade through a course given in his community. He has been doing this job for 5 years. In addition he works in agriculture, raising pigs and buying and selling cattle, which he learned from his grandparents. These are the principal sources of income for Juan.

He needs the loan to buy 3 pigs to raise and later sell at a better price. He will also buy cattle.

His dream is to have better installations to raise his pigs and care for his cattle. He also wants to finish paying off his loan and acquire another one to buy a truck which will facilitate the transport of the animals. He also wishes to support his children's education.

loans.use: to buy 3 pigs to raise and later sell at a better price, as well as to buy cattle

loans.name: Grupo Esmeralda Group

texts.es:
La tierra ha sido bendecida por manos que les gusta trabajar y cuidarla.  Es un oficio digno de admirar el que mujeres se dediquen por años y para toda la vida.  La tierra sin la labor de mujeres campesinas dedicadas al cultivo de la misma, no daría los frutos que sostienen generalmente a toda generación, es el trabajo que realiza Noelia  de  19 años de edad y tiene 1 hijo de tan solo un año de edad. (Noelia es la que se encuentra de 2da de derecha a izquierda en la fotografía)

La actividad que ella realiza es la siembra de maíz, ella lleva realizando dicha actividad durante más de 4 años, ella eligió esta actividad porque cuenta con terreno y clima apta para la siembra de maíz y le genera muy buenos ingresos económicos para ella, la segunda actividad que ella realiza es la venta de refacciones en su comunidad siempre con la visión de ayudar a sus vecinos en su comunidad.

Ella se ha convertido en un gran ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de mujeres emprendedoras se han unido a Noelia para emprender juntos con ella para tener éxitos en un futuro y tener ingresos económicos para sus familias.

El uso respectivo que ella le dará al crédito que ella realiza es para la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz ya que los fertilizantes son indispensables para poder obtener una buena cosecha. Una de las metas de Noelia es incrementar su producto de maíz y mejorar  sus prácticas de manejo en el cultivo de maíz.
texts.en:
The earth has been blessed by hands that like to work and to take care of it. It is a craft worthy of admiration that woman work at for years and for life. The earth without the labor of women farmers dedicated to cultivating the earth will not give fruit to sustain a whole generation. This is the work that Noelia, 19 years of age and with 1 child who is only a year old, performs. (Noelia is the woman found second from the right in the photo.)

She plants corn, and has been doing this work for more than 4 years. She chose this work because she has the right land and climate for the planting of corn. She generates very good earnings for herself. Her second job is selling spare parts in her community, always with the vision of helping her neighbors in her community.

She has become a great example in her community; because of this, a group of enterprising women have united with Noelia to set off together with her to be successful in the future and to have income for their families.

She will use the loan for fertilizers to grow corn, as fertilizers are indispensable to obtaining a good harvest. One of Noelia's goals is to increase her corn production and to improve her management practices in the growing of corn.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Grupo Tzanjuyup Sector Escuela No.01 Group

texts.es:
De 22 años de edad ya con grandes aspiraciones en dar a conocer a su comunidad y a todos los que la visitan la actividad que ella realiza con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación, soltera y vive con sus padres con el deseo de superar en la vida e alcanzar grandes sueños que ella quiere realizar en la vida, ella tiene dos hijos los cuales son excelentes estudiantes en la escuela de su comunidad. (Sara es la que se encuentra de 1ra de izquierda a derecha de la fotografía)
	
El trabajo que ella realiza con tanto esmero es la compra y venta de cortes típicas dicha actividad lo realiza en su casa y en lugares cercanos de su comunidad donde ella vive, ella lleva realizando dicha actividad durante 3 años, la segunda actividad que ella realiza es la venta de refacciones negocio que realiza con una hermana por más de cinco años porque les genera una ganancia para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia y comunidad.

Ella ha sido un ejemplo en su comunidad y es por ello que un grupo de mujeres se han unido a Sara para poder emprender sus negocios para que cada uno de ellas pueda supera y tener ingresos importantes.

El uso que ella le dará al préstamo que ella está realizando es para la compra de mercadería de trajes típicas para luego venderlas por los alrededores de su comunidad. Uno de las aspiraciones de ella es tener un local en el mercado de su comunidad y ver que sus hijos se convierten en profesionales en la vida.
texts.en:
Sara at 22 years of age already has great hopes of getting to know her community and all those who visit her business that she opened through so much effort and dedication. She is single and lives with her parents. She has the desire to excel in life and reach the great dreams that she wants to achieve in this life. She has two children who are excellent students in the local school. (Sara is the first from the left in the photo).

The work that she does with such care is the buying and selling of traditional clothing which she does from her house and in the communities close to where she lives. She has been doing this business for three years. The second business that she does is the sale of spare parts which she has dome with a sister for more than 5 years as it generates an income for the well-being of her family. It improves the economic conditions of her family and of the community.

She has been an example for her community. So a group of women have gotten together with Sara to be able to start their businesses so that each one of them can excel and have their own income.

The use for the loan that she is getting is to buy merchandise of traditional clothing and later sell them around her community. One of her hopes is to have a local in the market in her community and see her children become professionals in this life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise of traditional clothing.

loans.name: Pedro Humberto

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 54 años de edad, no posee ningún nivel académico ya que sus padres fallecieron cuando él estaba muy pequeño y tuvo que tomar las riendas de su hogar y mantener a su familia, ahora él está casado y tiene dos hijos que ya no viven con él.

Pedro trabaja la agricultura desde que estaba muy pequeño, actualmente cultiva dos hectáreas de granos básicos y la actividad la aprendió por un amigo suyo. 

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes como abonos entre otros, también pagará la mano de obra que le ayuda a trabajar sus cultivos.

Sus sueños son trabajar mucho con sus cultivos y espera tener una buena producción agrícola y sabe que lo puede lograr con la ayuda de su crédito.
texts.en:
Pedro is 54 years old. He has no education since his parents died when he was very young. Therefore, he had to take control of the household and support his family. Now he is married and has two children who no longer live with him.

Pedro has been working in agriculture from a very young age. He is currently cultivating two hectares of basic grains. Pedro learned the trade from a friend.

The loan he needs will be used to buy fertilizers, such as compost and other types. He will also pay for labor since he needs help with the farm work. His dreams include working hard in hopes that he will experience good production with his crops. He knows that he can achieve this with the help of his loan.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
De 41 años de edad Lorenzo en su estado civil  casado con dos hijo residentes en Suchitepéquez siendo el primero de 9 años de edad estudiante en la escuela de la comunidad y el segundo de 1 año de edad por los cuales tiene ese deseo de superarse.  

La actividad que dignamente desempeña para poder obtener ingresos y ganancias económicas es la realización de compra de abarrotería y venta de productos de abarrotería que se encuentra ubicado en su comunidad, eligió dicha actividad porque a tenido la oportunidad  de haber trabajado 6 años en dicha actividad y que si deja buena ganancia económica.

El motivo principal de la realización del préstamo es para poder comprar productos de abarrotería para poder obtener un ingreso económico y así mismo el ingreso de las ganancias para mantener un sistema económico y apoyar el desarrollo de su comunidad y la de su familia.

Sus metas personales en la vida y en los años próximos es obtener ganancias que estima de su negocio y en ampliar su negocio en la compra de más locales en el centro de su comunidad y en darle una educación mejor a su hijo para que llegue a ser un buen profesional en el futuro.
texts.en: 41-year-old Lorenzo is married with two children living in Suchitepéquez. The first one is 9 years old and a student at the school in the community. The second is 1 year old. For them, he dreams of getting ahead. His dignified job in buying groceries and selling them in his community to obtain an income and make a profit. He chose this activity because he had the opportunity and he new it would lead to profit after working in it for 6 years. His motive for taking out the loan is the purchase of groceries in order to obtain a profit and use it to maintain his business and support the development of his family and community. His personal goals in life and the next few years are obtaining the profits that he predicts from his business, expanding it by buying more space in the center of his community, an giving his son a better education so he can be a professional in the future.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan es un joven Dinámico de profesión maestro de educación secundaria, pero actualmente se desempeña como asistente pedagógico, en el ministerio de educación de la zona donde vive, es soltero sin hijos, actualmente  tiene la urgencia de resolver un problema familiar, por el cual visito Ceprodel `para solicitar financiamiento el que utilizaría en gastos familiares y de esa manera resolver la situación y mejorar las condiciones y nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Juan is a dynamic young man whose profession is teacher in secondary education, though at the moment he is working as a learning assistant at the Ministry of Education in the zone where he lives. 

He is single and has no children, but at the moment has an urgent family problem to resolve. For this reason he came to Ceprodel to request a loan that he will use for family expenses. In this way he can resolve the problem and improve his conditions and standard of living.

loans.use: to cover urgent personal expenses.

loans.name: Noreen

texts.en: Noreen is a 30-year-old married woman. She has two children. Noreen is running a business of cloth trading. She buys different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market, at wholesale rates, and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. She is working hard to bear her household expenses. Currently, Noreen is requesting a loan of 50,000 PKR from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profit on the betterment of her family members. She is in her fifth loan cycle and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary does farming in Tala town, where she grows cash crops to sell. She is 29 years old, married and, together with her spouse, has been blessed with three children.

She will be using this loan to buy fertilizer, manure and seeds for planting in her farm. She will use the anticipated profits to pay for her children's school fees as well as provide for the needs of her family.

This is her second loan term from VisionFund Kenya and her future hope is to be successful in her farming business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and seeds.

loans.name: Pathani

texts.en: Pathani is a 41-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing, and education. She, with her husband, has been working in agriculture for many years. They crop different vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. In order to purchase different types of seeds and packs of insecticides and pesticides, Pathani applied for a loan of PKR 40,000. This would help her to grow more crops which will ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds and packs of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Yaneisia Virginia

texts.es:
Yaneisia desea aprender un nuevo idioma y así desempeñarse de una mejor manera en el mundo laboral. Tiene 29 años de edad y esta soltera, es originaria de Rivas.
Tomo el curso de ingles ya que donde ella vive es una zona turística y este le ayudara para poderse relacionar con otras personas tanto social como laboralmente. Su padre y su hermana son su principal ayuda. Solicita el préstamo para lograr concluir sus niveles de ingles. Le será de mucha ayuda el préstamo ya que podrá terminar el curso y hablar perfectamente el idioma. Dentro de sus planes futuros está poner una academia de ingles y brindarles los cursos a otros jóvenes que lo necesitan. Su meta próxima es encontrar un trabajo en donde pueda desempeñarse muy bien. Uno de sus sueños es tener su propia línea de ropa.
texts.en:
Yaneisia wants to learn a new language so that she can do a better job in the workplace. She is 29 years old, single, and originally from Rivas.

Yaneisia is taking an English course since she lives in a tourist area. This will help her relate to other people, both socially and on the job. Her father and her sister are her main support. She is requesting a loan so that she can complete her English classes. The loan will be of great help since she will be able to finish the course and speak the language perfectly.

Her future plans include starting an English academy that provides courses to other young people who need them. Yaneisia’s next goal is to obtain a job where she can perform at her best. One of her dreams is to have her own line of clothing.

loans.use: to pay for the remainder of her English class.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials such as metal roofing sheets and beams.

loans.name: Mirtala

texts.es:
Mirtala de 41 años de edad, estudio pocos grados en la escuela porque también tenía que trabajar, está acompañada y tiene 2 hijos que dependen de ella. 

Mirtala se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 35 años de experiencia en esta actividad que aprendió de sus padres y también se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde y a la venta de huevos, ya que posee una granja de 150 gallinas ponedoras y 100 pollos de engorde, en estos trabajo se involucra su pareja y sus hijos.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar pollos y gallinas ponedoras, para mejorar la granja, comprará concentrado para aves y vitaminas para los mismos.

Sus sueños para un futuro son tener una granja  con las mejores instalaciones, y adquirir un nuevo crédito para la compra de una incubadora para pollos.
texts.en:
Mirtala is 41 years old and studied only a few years in school because she also had to work. She has a partner and two children who depend on her.

Mirtala devotes herself to domestic duties. She has 35 years of experience in this activity which she learned from her parents. She also makes a living raising and fattening chickens, and through the sale of eggs, since she has a farm of 150 laying hens and 100 chickens. This work involves her partner and her children.

She needs a loan to buy chickens and laying hens, to improve the farm, and to buy poultry feed and vitamins.

Her dreams for the future are to have a farm with the best installations, and to acquire another loan for the purchase of a chicken incubator.

loans.use: to buy chickens and laying hens, to improve the farm, and to buy poultry feed and vitamins

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, staple grains, soda, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en: Rukhsana, is a 58-year-old married woman and a mother of 4 children.  One of her sons (also shown in the photo) runs a small shop where he sells various items such as used mobiles, calling cards, mobile accessories and chargers, etc. He earns a good amount to contribute to the family income. For the improvement of his business, Rukhsana has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase more items such as calling cards, memory cards, and mobile batteries. In this way he will be able to meet the increasing demands of his clients and generate more revenue.

loans.use: to purchase more items such as calling cards, memory cards, and mobile batteries.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is now 37 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Arlene has a general store business in the Philippines. She now requests a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like coffee, milk, juice, soft-drinks and canned goods among other things to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Arlene has been in this business for 11 years. Arlene would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like coffee, milk, juice, soft-drinks and canned goods to sell

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en: Farzana is a 36 year old married woman. The man shown in the photo is Farzana’s husband who is a wholesaler by profession. He purchases different types of goods like cement and sand from the market and then sells them to various shops and other dealers. He has been doing this business for many years to meet the family's needs. In order to improve sales, Farzana has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR to Kashf Foundation. It will help her husband to purchase more stock of good quality cement and sand. Farzana is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of good quality cement and sand.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en: Sajida is a 32 year old married woman who has been engaged in buying and selling animals for the past 12 years. She is very enthusiastic in her business and manages to earn a reasonable amount of money to support her family. She is very motivated to provide her family with good food, health and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet the day to day expenses of life. It’s her 4th year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through their support. Now she has requested a loan of Rs 40,000 to purchase more animals. She expects to increase her earnings and aspires to save money for their prosperous future.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Yajaira Monserrate

texts.es:
En la  parroquia Calderón de la ciudad de Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Playa Prieta. Este lugar se lo conoce por su rica gastronomía y su vegetación,  la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y comercio en general.
En este lugar vive la señora Yajaira, tiene 32 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de 5 años que estudia en escuela. Su marido es maestro constructor.
Doña Yajaira es una muy buena madre que se vio en la necesidad de trabajar para ayudarle a su marido a salir adelante, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, la mayor parte de sus ventas las realiza en su casa, allí trabaja todos los días aunque tres días por semana  recorre puerta a puerta, deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de 6 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se gana lo suyo para beneficio de su familia.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva dos años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le han dado. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
In the Calderon parish of the city of Portoviejo, every fortnight the members of the Playa Prieta Communal Bank meet. This place is known for its delicious cuisine and its flora, most of its inhabitants work in agriculture and general commerce. 

Yajaira lives in this place, she is 32 years old, in a common-law marriage from which she has a 5 year old child who goes to school. Her husband is an expert builder.

Yajaira is a very good mother who saw the need to work to help her husband to get ahead. She works selling clothing of all types, the most part of her sales are done from her house, she works there every day although three days a week she goes from door to door, leaving a credit which she charges every eight days. She has been in this line of work for more than 6 years, with which she earns her own income for the benefit of her family.

This loan will be use to buy more merchandise such as: trousers, blouses, shirts and children's clothing. She has been in this communal bank for two years and she likes it because of the help they have always given her. Her dreams are to always give the best to her child.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, T-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Dzomo

texts.en:
Dzomo is married and has four school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for her family.

She has operated a business of buying and selling livestock, selling at the market to local neighbours. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and high cost of transportation within her place of operation. 

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase goats for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase goats for resale

loans.name: Margarita Isabel

texts.es:
Margarita una humilde trabajadora del hogar que dedica su vida a sus 4 hijos todos ellos adolecentes los cuales mantiene gracias a un negocio de venta de carne que tiene ubicado en su hogar en el cual compra cerdos y ella misma los prepara. 
Margarita pensando en el futuro de sus hijos todos ellos en edad para estudiar en una universidad quiere solicitar un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de 5 cerdos, pensando en tener existencias para cubrir sus pedidos e iniciar a pagar el estudio universitario de alguno de sus hijos e ir progresando paso a paso para darle la oportunidad a todos pues no dispone en el momento de los recursos pero ella sabe que con la ayuda de dios podrá lograrlo.
Pedimos que apoyen a esa soñadora y protectora madre que solo quiere lo mejor para su familia.
texts.en:
Margarita is a humble housewife who has devoted her life to her four children, all of whom are teenagers. She has been able to support them, thanks to her business of selling meat from her home. Margarita buys pigs and prepares the meat for sale.

Margarita is thinking about her children’s future since all of them are at the age when they are about to study at a university. She is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of five pigs. Margarita is planning to have inventory so that she can fulfill her orders and start paying for the university studies for some of her children, which would allow them to make progress a step at a time. This will give all of them an opportunity even though she has no available resources at the moment. However, she knows that she can accomplish this with the help of God.

Support is being requested for this idealistic and protective mother who only wants the best for her family.

loans.use: to buy five pigs for butchering.

loans.name: Lidia Rosibel

texts.es:
Lidia de 37 años de edad, estudió hasta 5° grado debido a la distancia de las escuelas en ese tiempo, está casada y su esposo se dedica a trabajar como albañil y también a la agricultura, tiene 4 hijos quienes viven con ellos, la primera tiene 19 años y estudió hasta bachillerato, dos más estudian bachillerato y el último en la escuela.

Ella se dedica a los oficios del hogar, desde que era una niña ha realizado esta labor, hace 3 años ella asistió a una capacitación de corte y confección que impartieron en su comunidad, lo cual ahora pone en práctica lo aprendido y es un ingreso extra para ella.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar 26 láminas, 400 tornillos para lámina, 13 metros de capote para el techo, 280 tornillos para capotes, y pagará el viaje del traslado de estos materiales, ella tiene ya su casa en un 70% de construcción y actualmente quiere ponerle el techo para que ya no se esté mojando.

Ella sueña con vivir en su nueva casa y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Lidia, 37, has a 5th grade education because of the distance to school in her day.  She is married and her husband works as a bricklayer and in agriculture.  She has four children who live at home.  The eldest daughter is 19 years old and has a high school education.  Two more are in high school and the youngest is in elementary.

Lidia takes care of the home and has done this type of work since she was a little girl.  Three years ago she took a sewing course offered in the community so now she uses her skill to earn extra income.

She is in need of a loan to buy 26 metal sheets, 400 nails, 13 meters of canvas, 280 nails for the canvas and to pay for transportation of the materials.  Her house is 70% finished and she currently wants to put a roof on it so it does not get wet.

Her dream is to live in her new house and to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: To buy 26 metal sheets, 400 nails, 13 meters of canvas, 280 nails for the canvas and to pay for transportation of the materials.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza De Calderón  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En la  parroquia Calderón de la ciudad de Portoviejo, cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Nueva Esperanza De Calderón. Este es un grupo de 11 mujeres que decidieron unirse tiempo atrás y formar este Grupo De Crédito que les va a servir  de mucho ya que con los créditos, ellos van a mejorar sus pequeños negocios que tienen. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como  agricultura, cría de animales, comercio, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Fanny, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 20, 19 y 12 años, menor estudia en colegio. Su esposo es agricultor.
Doña Fanny es una mujer muy trabajadora que le gusta ayudarle  a su marido a salir adelante ya que el no gana mucho con su labor en el campo, ella  se dedica a la cría de animales, compra chanchos cuando están pequeños los mantiene por un tiempo adecuado y luego los vende a los comerciantes que llegan hasta este lugar a comprar estos animalitos para llevarlos a o tras ciudades donde venden la carne en los distintos mercados, con esto ella se gana lo suyo que le sirve para salir adelante ya que hay temporadas en que su marido no tiene trabajo.
Este crédito es para comprar dos chanchos y alimento para chanchos y pollos.  Lleva 4 ciclos en el Grupo Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener salud y darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
In the Calderon parish of the city of Portoviejo, every fortnight the members of the Nueva Esperanza De Calderón communal bank meet. This is a group of 11 women who decided to come together a while back and form this communal bank which is going to help them a lot though loans, which are going to improve the small businesses that they have. They work in diverse sectors such as agriculture, animal husbandry, trade, food sales amongst other lines of work.

One of the members of this group is Fanny, 43 years old, married and from this relationship she has three children of 20, 19 and 12 years old, the youngest is in school. Her husband is a farmer.

Fanny is a very hardworking woman who likes to help her husband to get ahead as he doesn't earn much from his labor in the countryside. She works raising animals, buying pigs when they are young, keeping them for long enough and later selling them to the dealers who come to this place to buy these animals to take them to or through cities where they sell meat in various markets. This is how she makes a living and it helps her to get through during the seasons when her husband doesn't have work.

The loan is to buy pigs and feed for pigs and chickens. She has been in the communal bank for 4 cycles and she likes it because of the help the loans provide. Her dreams are to be healthy and give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy two pigs and feed for pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
En la  parroquia Calderón de la ciudad de Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Playa Prieta. Este lugar se lo conoce por su rica gastronomía y su vegetación, es este lugar la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y comercio en general.
En este lugar vive la señora Mariana, tiene 53 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ellos. Su esposo es maestro contratista trabaja en obras de construcción vial.
Doña Mariana es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para así ganarse lo suyo por el bien de su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y bisutería, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale a  recorrer la localidad por donde tiene sus clientes que siempre le compran, sale tres días por semana ya sea en las mañanas o tardes ya que no tiene un horario fijo, deja a créditos y cobra cada ocho o quince días dependiendo de lo que quieran sus clientes. Tiene más de 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le encanta ya que se gana lo suyo y se entretiene.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Lleva tres años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the members of the communal bank "Grupo de Crédito Playa Prieta" meet at the Calderón parish in the city of Portoviejo.  The area is known for its rich gastronomy and vegetation.  Most of the local people here work in agriculture or general commerce.

This is where Mariana, 53, lives.  She is married and has four adult children, two of whom still live at home.  Her husband is a master construction worker and is involved in road engineering.

Mariana enjoys working to earn an income and help the family.  She sells all kinds of clothing and jewelry on a door-to-door basis.  She goes out three days a week, in the morning or afternoon, to visit customers who always buy from her.  She has no fixed schedule and sells on a credit basis, collecting payment every eight or fifteen days, depending on the order.

She has been in business for over five years, which she loves because she earns her own money and stays busy.  She will use this loan to buy merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.  For three years she has been in the communal bank group which she likes because the loans finance her business.  Her dream is to continue improving her business.

loans.use: To buy pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
En la  parroquia Calderón de la ciudad de Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Playa Prieta. Este lugar se lo conoce por su rica gastronomía y su vegetación, es este lugar la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y comercio en general.
En este lugar vive la señora María,  tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ellos. Su esposo es comerciante y agricultor.
Doña María es una mujer que le gusta salir adelante y con su esfuerzo, tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad  como granos, legumbres, plátano y ciertas bebidas, también vende productos de bazar, cosméticos, perfumes, helados entre otras cosas, a ella le gusta tener bien surtida su tienda para darles a sus clientes lo que ellos necesitan,  le encanta su negocio ya que allí ella se gana algo que les sirve para salir adelante, lleva más de 2  años con su tienda.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para surtir su tienda. Lleva 3 ciclos en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan en  su negocio. Sus sueños son tener una tienda más grande y surtida.
texts.en:
Every fifteen days the members of the communal bank "Grupo de Crédito Playa Prieta" meet at the Calderón parish in the city of Portoviejo. The area is known for its rich gastronomy and vegetation. Most of the local people here work in agriculture or general commerce.

This is where María, 51, lives.  She is married and has four adult children, two of whom still live at home.  Her husband is a merchant and farmer.

María enjoys getting ahead through hard work.  She has a small grocery store at home where she sells all kinds of essential goods such as grains, legumes, bananas and certain beverages.  She also sells bazaar items, cosmetics, perfumes, ice cream and other goods.  She likes having a wide variety of goods to meet customer demand and enjoys what she does to earn an income.  Her store has been open for two years.

This loan will be used to buy groceries to stock her store.  She has been in the communal bank group for three loan cycles and likes how the loans help her business.  Her dream is to have a larger, well-stocked store.

loans.use: To buy groceries.

loans.name: Perveen

texts.en: Perveen is a 42-year-old woman. She is married and has seven children. She runs her business buying and selling cattle with her husband.  She buys animals like buffaloes and cows at low prices, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. In this way she earns high margins. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. However, due to the unavailability of funds, she is not able to expand her business. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and increase her income level. She is in her fourth loan cycle and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase animals.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie works hard to support her family. Elsie is married and she has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

Elsie requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more materials for her weaving business.

Elsie has been in this business for 30 years now.

Elsie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Noyaa Group

texts.en:
This group is made up of four people who are into kenkey (cooked corn paste), fish, groceries and cooking oil. It includes people from the same area who have an obvious desire to improve their living conditions. Their main work involves small-scale commerce. 

Emmanuel (the only male in the photo) is the featured borrower of the group. He is 57 years old, married, and all his children are grown up. He is very active in the group and has experienced good progress since joining it. He is a vendor of kenkey (cooked corn paste) and fried fish, which he supplies to his customers. He will purchase corn dough and fish, prepare kenkey and sell to his customers. He will use the profits in part to increase his savings and to develop his commerce, as well as take care of his home.

loans.use: To purchase corn dough and fish, prepare kenkey and sell to customers.

loans.name: Safia

texts.en: Safia is a 60-year-old married woman. She has been running her business manufacturing footballs for many years. She is contributing much to the family income, as her husband’s income alone is not sufficient to fulfill the demands of the family. Safia is a motivated mother of six children. She is liable to provide them with good quality food, health care and clothing. To improve her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR. The amount will be used to purchase thread, rubber bladders and leather covers in large quantities to cater to more customers. She hopes to  increase her sales, which ultimately will help in generating more cash. She dreams of providing a better standard of living for her family members.

loans.use: to purchase thread, rubber bladders and leather covers in large quantities

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret appreciates the loan given to her previously. It helped her a lot. 

With this loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase goats and cows for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more cows for her business.

loans.name: Antonietta

texts.en:
Antonietta is a 30-year-old married woman with one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Antonietta has a abaca-weaving business in the Philippines. Antonietta has requested a 15,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional raw materials like abaca fiber for her business. Antonietta has been in this business for two years. Antonietta would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials like abaca fiber for her business

loans.name: Emelie

texts.en:
Emelie is single and she has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

Emelie requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional raw materials for her business.

Emelie has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Emelie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her business

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Janet is 30 years old and she has two children who are currently in school.

Janet has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. Janet requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional raw materials for her business.

Janet has been in this business for five years. In the future, Janet would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials for her business

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina works hard to support her family. Josefina is married and she has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

Josefina requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional raw materials like abaca fiber, etc., for her business.

Josefina has been in this business for 20 years now.

Josefina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials like abaca fiber, etc., for her business

loans.name: Zubada

texts.en:
Zubada is a 50-year-old widow. She has been running a cloth-selling business for many years. She purchases a variety of cloth from the main city and then sells it to the people of her community. She has become well known for selling good quality cloth in her community. 

Zubada wants to make her business more profitable and to increase her income to support her family. But she has no funds to invest in her business.
